instruction: Hi, my sister and her girlfriends want me to play kickball with them. Can you explain how the game is played, so they don't take advantage of me?
output:
Hi, my sister and her girlfriends want me to play kickball with them. Can you explain how the game is played, so they don't take advantage of me?**

**Dad:** **Well, there are some things you probably don't want to know, but I'll do my best. Kickball is a sport where you throw the ball and then kick it. The object is to hit the ball with the side, or "spoon," of the foot so it goes over a 25-foot line and toward home plate. The team that gets the most points by hitting the ball the farthest wins. There's also usually a second team that defends home plate, and that team tends to try really hard to block your kick. On most kickballs, you play on a rubberized surface, so you won't be going too far.**

**Sis:** **Nooo, I mean, what if someone is dumber than I am and wants to play the game or something? Is there a way to make it less easy for them?**

**Dad:** **No. Well, there is one way.**

**Sis:** **Please don't say it.**

**Dad:** **Well, I was just going to say that each player starts by playing on their own side of the field, even if it's a no-foul ground rule. You can't walk up to people and ask, "Can I join your team? Please??" That's rude!**

**Sis:** **But they're not our friends, and they might not want to play with us.**

**Dad:** **Okay, let me rephrase. If you notice someone who seems really reluctant to play, don't put them through a difficult situation. Rather than forcing your way onto their team, I suggest you put in your best effort on your own team, then try to switch over later on.**

**Sis:** **Okay! That's more what I'm talking about.**

**Dad:** **I'm glad I could help. Have fun, and I'll see you guys back at the apartment.**

## 17  
Relationship Advice: Communication Is Key

**Your boyfriend/girlfriend is always talking about his/her family. Do you think you need to meet them?**

That's an excellent question...maybe! While meeting the family is an important ritual in most cultures, it's not a necessary part of any relationship's survival. It's a matter of preference and what feels right to you. If you enjoy hanging out with your boyfriend/girlfriend and have fun in your own world, that's perfect, without the family involvement. But there are three things you should consider:

  1. Does he/she have close relationships with their family? Do they always talk to you about them without ever seeing them?
  2. Does he/she have an unusual family situation? If, for instance, their parents are divorced or have serious medical issues, meeting them can be a comfort in times of need.
  3. Is there a special reason for you wanting to meet them? For instance, maybe it was something he/she always wished for when he/she was a kid or something they talked about every now and then, and you want to support that?

**Here are some things to consider about the parents:**

**How do they treat your partner? If they are kind, supportive, and encouraging toward him/her, that's great! Even if they are distant or critical in their dealings, it's still okay to meet them. The more comfortable he/she feels, the better the relationship will be.**

**Are they present in his/her life? Do they spend time with him/her and show him/her their love? This is a good indicator of the stability and support of the relationship.**

**What kind of things do they do in their lives? If they have a unique job, hobbies, or interests, meeting them might enhance your understanding of his/her lifestyle.**

**How do they present themselves to you? Are they open and honest about his/her family dynamics? This can help build your relationship by providing both trust and mutual respect.**

To weigh the pros and cons, keep in mind that meeting the family can be both a pleasure or a drag. In any case, you should decide together when the time is right. Sometimes it's best to meet his/her family, but sometimes it's better to wait until you have a great relationship already going with only the two of you.

Whatever your decision, being upfront and honest is essential. Speak with

instruction: How do I wrap a present neatly?
output:
How do I wrap a present neatly?

I'd love to give a gift card but how do I wrap it neatly?

I want to wrap my gift present in paper but how do I make it look neat?

Tips

1. Use a paper that covers the gift completely, from the bottom to the top, wrapping up one side, and then the other, until to just beneath the top of the gift.

2. Fold the overlapping paper under and cut the excess off neatly.

3. Next, insert a colorful, printed ribbon around the edge of the paper. If you want to make it look really neat, you can add a tag with the gift card details or your greeting message.

4. Finally, twist the sides of the ribbon to make a bow, which then forms the gift present in your desired shape.

66. Create a lovely gift card envelope

As part of your gift wrapping, you can also add a lovely, handmade envelope to the gift card box to make it extra special. It's a simple and quick way to make your gift look amazing!

Materials

Papertowel or piece of scrap paper

Scissors

Yoga mat or table or cushion to fold the paper onto

Directions

1. Lay the paper on the yoga mat and cut three triangles out of the corner of your piece of paper, using your scissors.

2. From your first triangle, grab the center and fold each side into the center point up to the fold. Use your scissors to snip the excess so that three flat corners are formed. The edges will be smooth and straight.

3. Next, take your second triangle and place it on top, matching up the corners so that one of the corners is in the folded part of the other triangle.

4. Now fold the other side into the middle so that the entire right side is folded, and cut your pen out so that you have two triangles. Fold it as you have the first triangle, and place it next to the second.

5. Fold the top edge of the third triangle down to meet the second and the first. Push your fingers across the top of the paper so that the edges meet. If you like, you can also use your fingers to create a little seam.

6. Cut the bottom portion off along the diagonal line to form the envelope.

7. Use the scissors to cut out a little doo-hickey or flourish of your design that will adorn the top of your envelope.

8. Tuck the gift card into the envelope and the gift wrapping is done! You can use a colored ribbon to attach the envelope to your gift.

Keep it cute & simple

Tips

If you are feeling like you need something more than this, try making a gift card or envelope holder with some plain brown paper. You can use some ribbon or scrapbooking embellishments to create something extra nice. There are some templates online that may be helpful to follow or print to create your own.

67. Make a little gift basket

Do you enjoy the idea of getting someone a little gift basket full of fun surprises? It is a fun way to get creative with a personalized gift that is great for any special occasion. To make your gift basket look especially lovely, you can use pretty paper bags, ribbons, and a beautiful bow to tie around your gift basket.

Materials

Stripes of paper

Ribbons of varying widths

Scrapbooking glue

Scraps of cardstock

Instructions to make a little gift basket

1. Take a length of paper and wrap it around an item, such as a bottle or wine.

2. Use your glue to adhere the paper to the base of the item.

3. Take another strip of paper and wrap it around the bottle or item, using adhesive to adhere it. Then put the paper ribbon on the right side of your paper ribbon or your gift wrap, if you prefer.

4. Take another piece of scrapbooking paper or paper and wrap it around the item. Use glue where necessary to secure it in place, and tie the two pieces together with ribbon.

5. Use another piece of paper and paper, or tissue paper to wrap the item. You want it to be soft, so that it stays soft when it is wrapped to your item.

6. Use a piece of ribbon or ribbon to tie the two together and keep wrapping your paper until you have the desired number of layers.

Tips

Make your gift basket beautiful by adding some scented candles or even bubble bath, bath salts or body lotion. You can attach a picture of the person and some love notes or a personalized note or two. You can also do

instruction: How do I dice without slicing my finger
output:
How do I dice without slicing my finger off? This is a common question among people who need to dice food but are put off by the risk of getting hurt. If you use a good knife or sharpener, there are several techniques you can try to make sure you do not hurt yourself.
To begin, have a bowl and a cutting board at hand. Then, make sure that the blade of the knife is sharp enough, and you need to learn how to use the knife the right way. You should only go over the meat by running the knife on top of the block when you cut.
You may use your hand to hold a cutting board, but if not, use a thick towel to keep it in position. Place your finger where you want to make the cut, then tap the knife on the cutting board or wall. With a sharp knife, this will be enough to create a knife cut.
Tip one: When you’re getting ready to slice, make sure you get in position for the cut. Your thumb should be on the handle so that you can keep control of the knife. Your fingertip should be above your blade when you cut.
Tip two: Hold the knife in the right way. Keep your knife in the left hand and your hand above the blade. Then, use your thumb, index and middle fingers on the handle to grip the knife. You should make sure your thumb and index fingers are together, and your middle finger should be directly above the blade.
Tip three: Practice makes perfect. You may not get the technique with just one attempt. You can try for a few cuts before you get it right. Keep working on the technique, and you’ll get the hang of it after a few attempts.
Dice foods with food color.
You can use food color to see where your line should be. With an orange or white food coloring, you can see it better. You can also apply a small amount of the food coloring on your fingertip to gauge how thin or thick the cut will be.
There are several things that you will need, but here’s the essential stuff. For instance, you will need a cutting board, knife and, the food that you want to diced. Here’s how to do it.
Place the food on the board. To slice the meat, first, place the food in the middle where it will remain steady. Then, bring the knife to the top of the block and start slicing. After each cut, rotate the block so that the blade will not touch the cutting board. Don’t forget to keep a safe distance from the edge of the board to avoid cutting.
You can also chop your food in the middle. If you want to dice the food quickly, you can cut it in the middle. Place a cut of food in the middle of the board. Then, cut the food in the middle so that you get two cut pieces. Afterwards, cut the cut piece in half. This will speed up the cutting process. Try it, and see what you can do.
With this technique, you can diced ingredients like onions, peppers, carrots, and tomatoes. Place a piece of veggie in the middle of the board and use the knife to slice it through. If it’s not diced evenly, press it in to your preferred shape.
You can also use the technique to diced small vegetables. For instance, you can make carrot rounds, green onions, and onions. You can make rounds by laying the vegetable in the middle with each side touching the board. When you go to chuck the cut, you will get a ring shape.
Place the food on the board, and you get a good grip. Then, use your knife to cut into the meat.
If you have thickly prepared vegetables or food, then this technique is perfect for you. When you have a block of food, wrap your fingers around the middle of it, then use the knife to cut through. Try it again, and the result should be an even diced shape with no corners.
There are many cooking technique that you can try when cooking, and dicing is an essential one. You can take the time to learn and get the cutting technique right. With time and practice, you can achieve a professional result.
Always carry a good knife, and sharpen it regularly. In addition, make sure you keep your cutting board sanitary by washing them, and you shouldn’t use them for any other purpose. You can also use a cutting board made of high-density thermoplastic sheets or the disposable ones. To ensure perfect dicing without risking injury, use the right technique, carry proper, and learn from mistakes.

instruction: Who is Larry Page?
output:
Who is Larry Page?
Founder of Google.
He is married to Wendy Google (sorry, we all think that is what she’s called, it is apparently her middle name).
He’s been dating his first love, Sara Blakely, for the past 10 years.
He’s a vegetarian.
We think it’s safe to say that not many of us, who have been involved with finance and investments to various degrees, were aware of the name Larry Page, let alone the story behind it.
He didn’t become famous overnight, although Google certainly changed all that. Despite the fact that, at this point in time, he is a billionaire and Google is now Google Inc, Larry Page’s story is still one of those that’s fascinating to hear about.
From humble start to billionaire founder of one of the most famous search engines in the world, it’s hard to ignore how Larry Page managed to go from zero to hero and to inspire millions to follow in his footsteps through the use of technology.
From the moment the idea for Google was just a concept, Larry Page was there with the vision and desire to get it launched. He wanted the world to search for everything they could ever want to know. From the very beginning, Google was designed for people to find what they were looking for, quickly and effectively.
When it came to creating the first version of Google, Larry Page was just a graduate student in computer science, so he was pretty green. Nevertheless, his ideas and the commitment he showed to make Google a success, drove the project forward, and since then, he’s been instrumental in designing and shaping Google’s growth. Today Google has a market cap of nearly $900 billion, and its stock price is $988.18 as of August 4, 2015.
Since its inception, Google was successful. Just a year later, in 1999, Google, then as a search engine, was already popular. And the rest, as they say, is history. From there on, Larry Page played a key role in the development, design, and expansion of Google.
Larry Page’s Career before Google
Born on March 26, 1973, in Michigan, Larry Page didn’t grow up in an affluent family. His father worked as a dentist and his mother was a homemaker. As such, he grew up doing chores and spending most of his time with his three siblings, including a younger brother by just 18 months.
Even during his teenage years, Larry Page was known as being quite bright and academic. He demonstrated a keen interest in technology, creating a video game based on his invention called “Gnomes.” He also built a computer that was the size of a refrigerator.
In his early years, Page went on to attend the University of Michigan. He was known as an intense student and as a young entrepreneur. During his student years, he became a member of the Michigan Computer Science Club and served as president.
With strong interests in computer science, Page continued with his studies and earned a Bachelor Degree in applied mathematics and computer science in 1995.
Even before completing his degree, Larry Page started to work at Stanford as a researcher. He joined the Stanford AI Laboratory, where he worked for two years.
In 1999, having studied computer science and having worked as a researcher, Larry Page returned to Michigan to start looking for a job.
He visited several companies, including Netscape, Intel, and Apple. Unfortunately, despite his qualifications, Larry Page wasn’t able to get a job at any of the companies.
In 1998, Page and Sergey Brin were both working alongside the company, Excite, which had a search engine that, at the time, was fairly popular.
After spending a year working alongside Excite, which was then bought out and renamed to Go Live, Larry Page and Sergey Brin decided to leave. Since then, Brin was looking for a job at a new internet company, whereas Page was still searching for opportunities.
Although they went on to work for other companies, such as Infoseek and Yahoo, they still kept in touch and were continuing to investigate opportunities.
In 2000, Larry Page and Sergey Brin set up a business plan and joined forces to create a new Internet Search Engine, which was to be called “Google.”
Google was originally named Backrub at that time, but a year later, the business was renamed Google.
In 1999, Larry Page and Sergey Brin incorporated Google in California, USA. However, they set up a second office in Menlo Park, which was known as the Googleplex. The building is a campus that consists of more than 30 buildings. In addition, Google has also got its headquarters in

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Georgian  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Kubdari?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Georgian  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Kubdari?
Kubdari is indeed a very delicately flavoured Georgian dish with a hint of mint and a delicate spice  and it is definitely worth the  try! Kubdari are meatballs baked on a bed of sour cherry sauce, and its name comes from khudjari, which means to grind into fine powder (usually rice or flour) in Georgian. The meatball itself contains a large proportion of liver, which is soaked in a marinade of mint, garlic, onion, and spices before being cooked for 90 minutes or so in a large casserole (kubdari). A sour cherry sauce is poured over the meatballs halfway through the cooking process, and the whole thing is then covered and left to simmer until the meatballs are tender and the sauce has thickened. Kubdari was originally the signature dish of the aristocracy (kakhaberi) and today is still a popular dish in Georgian homes, usually served at religious and public gatherings. They taste particularly good with plain Georgian bread and a glass of cool, fresh mountain tea, ideally served in a mountainous region of Georgia. Here is the traditional Georgian version of Kubdari with sour cherry sauce.  Enjoy!
500G of beef liver or lamb liver
400g of minced (ground) beef
1/2 tbsp of minced garlic
2 tbsp of chopped fresh mint
1 chopped onion
1/2 tsp of turmeric powder
Salt and black pepper to taste
250g of sour cherry sauce  instructions below
600g of plain bread
1.	Soak the chopped liver in a large bowl with 2 handfuls of hot water and a small plate or skillet to strain the excess water. Leave to soak for 10-15 minutes.
2. In another bowl, mix the minced beef or lamb, onion, mint, garlic and turmeric powder with a fork or a spoon. Sprinkle some salt and pepper onto the mixture.
3. Remove the liver from the water and pat it dry with a clean cloth. Discard the water.
4.	Grind the soaked liver in a food processor or blender and add it to the meat mixture. Mix everything well.
5.	Shape 16-20 meatballs with your hands or a spoon and place on a tray. Cook them in a preheated oven or a big casserole (kubdari) filled with water until meatballs are completely cooked and tender.
6.	Meanwhile, prepare the sour cherry sauce in a saucepan filled with water. You will need 3-4 cups of water plus 1-2 handfuls of dried sour cherries. Cook the cherries in the water until tender, and then blend the mixture with a blender until it becomes like a smooth sauce. Add salt and pepper to taste.  Add the sour cherry sauce on top of the meatballs halfway through their cooking process. The meatballs are cooked after 90 minutes.
7.	Place the sour cherry sauce on top of the meatballs and put the lid of the casserole with the meatballs on the top of the sauce before placing it in the preheated oven (or a big casserole filled with water) until the sauce is thickened and the meatballs are completely cooked and tender.
8. Serve the Kubdari with plain Georgian bread, a cool glass of water, and a glass of red wine or  a glass of natural Mountain Tea.
For the sour cherry sauce, start with 1000g (2.2 pounds) of sour cherry jam (a product which can be purchased from a health food shop or online), 400 ml ( 14 ounces) of sugar, 500 ml (27 ounces) of water and 600 ml (25 ounces) of water. Put the raw sour cherries, half a cup of water and 1 tablespoon of sugar into a large saucepan and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium to low and gently simmer the mixture until the sour cherry pulp looks like it is soft enough to be blended into a smooth sauce  remove from heat. Let the sauce sit so that it can cool down to room temperature.
Blend the sour cherry mixture and then strain it through a fine-mesh sieve/straining bag, a piece (moufflon) of cheesecloth or a muslin cloth. Pour the sauce back into the saucepan and cook on a low heat to reduce it further until it becomes dense and flavourful. Add the remaining

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Somali  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Canjeero?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Somali  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Canjeero? I'll keep them coming (I'm glad you like them!), but you don't have to try all of them, as long as you enjoy them. As you already mentioned.
Somali cuisine has a unique style by being the combination of East African, Arabic and Indian cuisine. The most of the Somali recipes are dairy-rich and heavy on spices and usually includes spices like saffron and cardamom. In Somalia, "Canjeero" is one of the delicacy dishes made of a type of wheat bread used to substitute for bread or rice. Canjeero is a type of flatbread made from wheat flour, milk or yogurt and can be used in combination with meat, vegetables, rice, and beans to make a complete meal that is highly satisfying.
Canjero is a fluffy and chewy type of bread, which is very similar to Afghan bread (called "Naan Bread"). Canjeero can be made at home by using bread dough, which can be seasoned to your taste. Canjeero is usually eaten with a topping of milk (yogurt, ghee, or butter), as well as in some dishes like Somali's "Goob-Toma" or "Cob-Toma", to add flavor to the dish.
1. Take a mixing bowl and add the bread flour, water and salt; mixing together with a wooden spoon. Make sure the dough is perfectly combined. It will look like a wet, sticky dough at this point.
2) Cover the bowl with plastic wrap; let it rest for at least 10 – 15 minutes (for the flour to absorb the moisture).
4.) Once the dough is ready, add some oil to your hands and knead the dough until it becomes smooth, and elastic like your hand. Knead the dough for at least 10 – 15 minutes or until it is smooth, soft, and elastic; this is very important step in making canjeero bread. Make sure your kneading the dough for an even amount of time, not too hot or too cold, and knead just soft enough to give the bread the right texture for Canjeero.
5.) After kneading, divide the dough into 1-gram sized pieces, and roll into small balls. You can make even smaller if you want to make canjeero biscuits.
6.) Once you are done rolling, leave the dough with a wet towel on it for 30 minutes; during this time, it is going to form its shape and rise.
7.) Preheat the oven, then gently press each ball to flatten it; you can also make small slits on it to make it look more decorative.
8.) Put the flat breads on a non-stick baking sheet, covered with a wet towel for an additional 20 minutes.
9. Bake for an additional 20 minutes until the bread turns golden brown.
1.) For the topping, mix the yogurt, milk and sugar together until well blended.
2.) Spread the mixture on top of your Canjeero bread. You can also use goat's milk if you like.
3.) Serve with milk or ghee (butter).
Canjeero is a very delicious and flavorful bread which is rich in proteins, fiber, and calcium. Enjoy it, and I hope you will love it!
Canjeero, also known as “Filla” has become very popular in many countries in the world, and it now available in many different varieties. Canjeero dough is usually served cold rather than hot, making it an excellent choice for summer. Its perfect for sandwiches, toasts or simply eating with your milks or butter. It is also used as a base for soups and stews.
Canjeero is made with simple ingredients and requires little preparation. The main ingredients are wheat flour, water, salt, and oil or yogurt. Canjeero dough consists of wheat flour, water, milk, and oil or yogurt. Canjeero is a very common recipe in Somali cuisine, and it is served in many African countries as well. It is a great alternative for those who prefer bread, but want a healthier and lighter alternative. The recipe for canjeero dough is easy to follow, and it is perfect for those who haven't used bread dough for its baking.

Are you ready to become the best version of yourself? Here's everything you need to know about weight lifting (lift weights) and how to start a safe and effective workout routine.
Weightlifting has been around for thousands of years and is an essential part of many people’s fitness routines. While lifting weights is not suitable for all body types, it’s an excellent way for people of all ages, skill levels, and fitness goals to increase muscle mass. This type of exercise helps to build muscle strength, improves overall conditioning, and boosts bone density. It also helps to enhance metabolism and reduces the risk of heart disease and other forms of chronic illness.
If you’re new to weightlifting, it can be overwhelming, but, with proper guidance and knowledge, anyone can get started on this fitness journey. This guide will provide insight into the benefits of weightlifting for beginners, tips for getting started, as well as what to do in the gym.
Many experts suggest lifting weights as an effective and efficient means of building muscle mass and improving overall strength. While this type of exercise requires a significant amount of commitment, attention to detail, and a proper training routine, it offers numerous benefits that can affect the overall health, fitness, and well-being.
The key to successful weight lifting lies in the form of exercise, frequency, volume, and intensity. When it comes to improving fitness, lifting weights is a highly effective exercise for weight loss, toning muscles and improving the overall look and feel of the body. With a little knowledge and guidance, you can start lifting weights and reap all the benefits that come with it.
How to get started with weight lifting as a beginner
Weightlifting is one of the most effective types of exercises for building muscle. While it may be intimidating at first, with proper guidance, the gym can be a safe and rewarding place for beginners to start building muscle. Here are 10 tips for beginners who are just starting their lifting journey:
1. Start with a proper warm-up: A proper warm-up helps to prepare the body for the exercise and increases blood flow to the muscles. It can also help to reduce the risk of injury.
2. Lift weights in a moderate fashion: Beginners should start with weights that are within their capabilities. While a beginner may have some strength, starting with heavier weights can increase the risk of injury.
3. Focus on form first: Although it’s easy to start lifting weights, it’s crucial to develop proper form. Incorrect form can lead to injury and prevent you from benefiting from your workout.
4. Set realistic goals: Setting individual and group goals can help with motivation and track progress.
5. Listen to your body: Your body is the most important aspect of lifting weights. So, listen to the signs that your body sends when performing an exercise or workout.
6. Focus on specific muscles: Workout program options can help in achieving specific body goals and lifting a target body part.
7. Start small: Many experts advise newbies to start lifting moderately to reduce the risk of injury.
8. Remember to incorporate cardio: Cardio helps to improve breathing and cardiovascular health.
9. Practice good form: A good form is essential when lifting weights, and it helps to develop body strength efficiently.
10. Train with someone who knows the ropes: It may be daunting to start weight lifting on your own and train with someone who knows the techniques and has experience in lifting weights can help you get the best results.
How to decide which exercises to do with weights
Lifting weights can be an intensely rewarding form of exercise as it builds muscle mass, shape and tones the body, and promotes a healthy weightlifting plan. But what type of exercises should you perform to achieve those goals? There are many exercises you can choose from when lifting weights, and here are just a few sample exercises:
1. Bench Press: This exercise exercises the upper and lower back, neck, shoulders, and triceps. It also builds the chest muscles.
2. Deadlift: The deadlift trains the buttocks, hamstrings, traps, glutes, hips, and back.
3. Squats: Squats work on the hamstrings, calves, butts, glutes, and quadriceps, and improves overall fitness.
4. Back Extensions: This exercise

instruction: Do you know why turkeys became the official food of thanksgiving?
output:
Do you know why turkeys became the official food of thanksgiving?
A Native American tribe named the Wampanoags taught the Pilgrims the art of cultivating and using maize, which they called “Indian corn.” When the Pilgrims harvested their corn, they roasted some of it with some apples and spices they’d brought from Europe, and gave the meal as a gift to the Wampanoags.
Do Thanksgiving dinners always come with cranberries?
Cranberry sauce is traditionally served at Thanksgiving and Christmas dinner, both due to what it symbolizes at Thanksgiving and also because it is widely consumed throughout the holiday season.
Who started the tradition of wearing red?
The Red Dress Day tradition began in 1996 as a way to show support for cancer research. The original name of the event was “The International Day of a Red Dress for Missing and Murdered Women.”
Are we thankful on Thanksgiving?
Since the first Thanksgiving was celebrated in 1621 in what is now Massachusetts, the United States has set aside the fourth Thursday of November each year to celebrate the holiday. In 1863, Abraham Lincoln officially proclaimed Thanksgiving a national holiday, and it has since been observed over the years with different traditions.
Did Pilgrims really come to America?
Over 20 million Pilgrims traveled to America, and they set out upon a path of discovery and expansion that would eventually lead to the establishment of the United States. The Pilgrims were a group of English Separatists who believed in religious tolerance and the right of individuals to worship as they chose.
What day do we celebrate Thanksgiving?
Who invented cranberry sauce?
The first recorded recipe for cranberry sauce was in a cookbook by Sarah Josepha Hale, an American editor and womens’ rights advocate, in 1846. However, it wasn’t until several years later that cranberry sauce became a staple at Thanksgiving dinner.
Why is cranberry sauce served at Thanksgiving?
Cranberries were an important ingredient in what became traditional Thanksgiving fare. Early settlers discovered that cranberries grew throughout Massachusetts, along with corn, and they ate them with corn bread during their harvest celebrations. Today, cranberry sauce is considered de rigueur at Thanksgiving dinner.
What kind of food do they eat in Turkey?
Turkey can be served alone, or it can be used as a base for other dishes. Turkey is a staple in the Turkish diet, with each region having its own way of preparing it.
Why do we eat cranberry sauce at Thanksgiving?
Cranberry sauce is generally served as a condiment with the turkey of Thanksgiving dinner, as well as throughout the holiday season. The history of the dish goes back to Plymouth Colony in 1621 where Native Americans taught colonists to harvest and use cranberries.
What does turkey mean in Thanksgiving?
The Native American turkey has become the official bird of Thanksgiving in honour of the first feast held in Plymouth, Massachusetts in 1621. The bird, which has become an iconic emblem of Thanksgiving, is usually roasted or boiled, and is accompanied by a number of dishes traditionally associated with the holiday such as turkey gravy, mashed potatoes and cranberry sauce.
Was Thanksgiving invented in Turkey?
Turkey is not known as the country of the holiday Thanksgiving. In fact, Thanksgiving has no official connection to Turkey. Still, Turkey, like many other countries, has developed traditions around Thanksgiving.
Why is turkey important in Turkey?
Today, turkey is seen as a symbol of the country, and is often served on special occasions like Thanksgiving, National Turkey Day and New Year celebrations. Interestingly, both the wild and domestic turkey served in Turkey today have become the country’s second-most popular export, only behind the Turkish bath soap called “soap, bath soap” and is sold worldwide.
Is turkey the national bird of Turkey?
The national bird of Turkey is the pheasant. However, many people often confuse pheasant and turkey, because they are very similar in appearance.
In Conclusion, It might sound weird, but Turkey does not celebrate Thanksgiving Day or the United States of America. Turkey is a Muslim country, and its national day, Republic Day, is celebrated on October 29 every year.
Do you know why turkeys became the official food of Thanksgiving? Turkey is not known as the country of the holiday Thanksgiving. In fact, Thanksgiving has no official connection to Turkey. Still, Turkey, like many other countries, has developed traditions around Thanksgiving. Today, turkey is seen as a symbol of the country, and is often served on special occasions like Thanksgiving, National Turkey Day and New Year celebrations.

instruction: Are there any weird Christmas traditions?
output:
Are there any weird Christmas traditions?”
I think the only weird Christmas tradition any of them could even imagine was putting their own decorations up, because they rarely get to.
This morning’s lesson was all about that time of year when, the holiday spirit is in the air, family and friends gather around a Christmas tree, cookies are baked and wrapped, and, of course, presents are wrapped, wrapped, wrapped.
(I’m starting to think I’m the odd one out in this picture)
“Is there a tradition for wrapping gifts?” Mrs. S asked, the very same question that had crossed Mrs. S’s mind.
The students agreed, all in unison, “No, not really.”
One of the boys who came earlier than his classmates, asked, “I remember when I was a kid, they called them gift wrappers. But then we just decided that wrapping paper was just paper.”
(I’m surprised how much I remembered what they were called)
“Isn’t that nice that people just decided?” Mrs. S quipped, but still on the subject of wrapping. “We’re going to wrap up each gift by wrapping some paper around it. How many papers do we need, do you think, to make a gift look nice?”
“Two is good,” one of the boys offered.
“That’s not bad, since you will need some tape over the top too.”
Mrs. S pulled out some sheets of construction paper from an old bag. “But we’re going to make them with different colors. When you think of a holiday and festivities, you may think of bright colors that are in the holiday spirit. So this is our first clue,” she said, handing a piece of paper to each student.
She then gave each student a different color of construction paper, which was enough of a clue about who got which piece, or color, to be able to do their job without any confusion.
As the day went on and the work on gift wrapping progressed, a few of the students turned to my husband. The conversation that Mrs. S could have easily been a part of, was now turned into something they only did between themselves and me. When Mr. S found out about this conversation, he wondered, “Well…where does all this come from… the talk of wrapping paper, wrapping the Christmas gifts?”
I told him that I couldn’t tell him anything. “It’s one of the ways the universe works, to bring what needed to happen, to happen.”
Mrs. S asked the students, “So… what color was your piece of paper? Why was that color important to how you liked to wrap gifts?”
“Red,” one student said.
“I remember, for Santa Claus, the red is the hat, the red is the suit. So, it’s a nice, warm, red, a happy color.”
“Or,” someone else chimed in, “sometimes we like the Christmas tree to be red, too.”
Mrs. S noted, “Good point. So, red is definitely good for Christmas. But what color is good for another holiday?”
“Green!” a student suggested, “because it’s like Christmas… and… Easter!”
“That’s a good thought.” The students began to discuss the colors of their papers and how those colors related to what they liked to do, or like, or how those colors symbolize the holidays.
One thought that came out when Mrs. S was talking about wrapping paper, was that maybe wrapping paper, in some way, is a metaphor for the wrapping process of wrapping a gift. It takes a lot of effort, and time, to wrap a gift, wrapping it tightly and getting it to how it should look.
“As with wrapping the gifts, we have to be careful of all the pieces, and try not to tear the paper,” Mrs. S told the students. Then an idea came to her. “I have an idea, but it might be a while. Sometimes it takes many lessons before we get to the point where we have an idea that clicks and makes sense—”
The students were eager to get the story behind the idea, or “the idea,” as they were calling it.
She proceeded to tell them about wrapping a present, taking a lot of time and effort to wrap it up. She went through the process of how it had to be done, and that it may not be perfect because it doesn’t have to be. But, what makes it perfect, is that is exactly the thought when wrapping gifts in the holiday season – even though no person can take the time or the effort to get it all perfect, the gift to the recipient looks perfect when it’s wrapped up tight.
Mrs. S told them, “The holiday season is a time when it’s okay

instruction: Hi, I'm interested in learning to play badminton. Can you explain the game to me?
output:
Hi, I'm interested in learning to play badminton. Can you explain the game to me?
First, here's what the equipment will look like: You'll need a badminton racket, shuttlecock, and a net and post to set up the court. Now, I'll give you a quick run-down of how the game is played: The shuttlecock is hit forward across the net, and the player who wins the point is the player who first has the shuttlecock hit off their side of the net. If your opponent manages to hit the shuttlecock back, and your shuttlecock lands on your side of the court or in your opponent's court, you've either won a point or lost a point, depending on which side you're on when it lands. Every stroke is different - some are short, easy to hit, while others are long, tricky, and require some real finesse. Some strokes require you to stand or lean right, others left, and some require you to jump, or move side-to-side quickly. You also need to make sure that you can hit the shuttlecock high and deep, either to drive it back or to hit it over the net. Basically, the game is a lot of running, jumping, and spinning!
I love badminton, and I'm trying to get into competitive play with a club. What do I need to do?
Competitive badminton means playing with a partner, or even a team. The first thing you need to know is that your partner(s) can have a very important role in whether you're able to succeed (or not) in a competitive setting. The most important thing is to get the right balance between attacking and defending. That means you need a partner who can play both offense and defense. In other words, he or she needs to be able to hit strong shots while also being able to jump, run and hit long passes accurately and consistently. This doesn't mean they should always do the defensive work - it simply means that there's a good balance between the two. They also need to have a well-developed fitness level too, but that's a problem you'll have to solve by working with them on the court together. Next, you need to get to know the rules of the game. One way to do this is to go to a tournament. You can learn a lot about the game from the rules, from the other players, and from other club members. Another way to learn about the game is to watch or listen to pro videos or interviews with top players. You can also watch pro matches on TV or at the club. And finally, the most important thing is practice! Practice with the person you're playing with or with your team, and work on both your technique and your consistency. The more practice you get, the better you will become - and the more likely it is that you will succeed in competitive play.
What's the best way to teach someone who's never played badminton before, how to get started?
One of the best ways to teach someone who's never played badminton before is to have them get a complete set of equipment, including a shuttlecock, racket, and nets. The best way to get started is by having the person start playing by themselves, to get used to the equipment, the feel of the racket, and the motions that will be necessary to use the shuttlecock properly. Once they can play reasonably well alone, they can begin practicing with someone else, ideally someone who's an experienced player. The experienced player can go over the basics of badminton, the rules, and the motion necessary to play the game. The inexperienced player can start by playing the ball back and forth with the experienced player, and in time, they can move up to playing an actual match, in which the experienced player teaches the game, plays the ball, and gives advice before and during the match. If a beginner is willing to invest in a racket and shuttlecock, then they will have an easier time getting started, so that's an important thing to consider.
How do I buy a new racket, and what makes a good one?
One of the most important things to consider when buying a badminton racket is the way the racket feels in your hands—not only because it can dictate how you hit the shuttlecock, but also because it can help you find and maximize your own strengths. The feel of a racket is largely a matter of personal design preference—but you may want to consider one or two of the following factors: the shaft angle (the angle of the shaft, which is the vertical dimension of the racket), the balance (the ratio between the weight on the front, or swing-through end of the racket and the weight on the rear, or handle end of the racket), and the

instruction: Do you know why cats always rub up against your legs?
output:
Do you know why cats always rub up against your legs? It turns out that it has nothing to do with purring or saying, "Meat my furry friend!" (well, maybe that just makes them sound more lovable) â but it's actually a way that they communicate to you that they're happy and comfortable around you.
Some of them even use their paws to brush their fur and massage their legs all at the same time! When a cat rubs their paws against your legs, it's a way for them to give you affectionate scratches and get your attention.
But that's not all! Cats need attention, just like us humans. They also have things that will make them feel more comfortable and at ease around us. When you're the one providing them with food and shelter, they'll show it by rubbing up against you in an act of gratitude and affection.
It doesn't matter if you're an expert at pet-raising or have just recently adopted a new furry friend â providing the best comfort and care means making sure that your cat is happy and healthy when you're not around.
11. Cats have a long lifespan compared to their parents.
Even though our cats might not live over 20 years like our dogs, they do have a pretty long lifespan compared to their furry parents.
Most cats die of natural causes between the ages of 7 and 13 years old, which is still a relatively long life span for the feline family. However, cats that are over 10 years old, they are considered to be senior cats and need extra care to keep them healthy and safe.
12. Cats love milk.
Unlike dogs that seem to love milk almost as much as they do food, cats don't like it too much because milk can actually bother their digestive systems. However, that doesn't mean that cats don't appreciate a good serving of dry cat food!
Milk and other dairy products can be harmful to cats, but you can still offer them treats and homemade treats that incorporate milk products in a nutritious and harmless way.
13. Cats are good at communicating with other cats.
When it comes to the feline community, cats understand each other's needs and body language better than humans do. Cats have their own unique ways of communicating with each other, such as meowing, purring, and scratching.
When a cat meets another cat, they start with a greeting by rubbing their heads and bodies together, followed by meowing loudly before starting to engage with each other. But what about them communicating with us, you ask? Well, the best way to see if a cat is communicating with you is through your interaction! If a cat starts doing "crazy cat behavior" like scratching furniture or chasing their tail, chances are they're trying to communicate with you about something.
14. Female cats can get pregnant when they're only 6 months old.
Did you know that female cats can get pregnant and have kittens when they're only 6 months old? It's fascinating that you can have kittens that are half "pregnant" at a young age!
When you bring a cat into your family, it's important to make sure you have the time needed to get to know them fully and understand how old they really are. And make sure that you have enough space and resources to provide for their needs.
15. Cats can't eat spicy food.
Whether you're eating some hot chili at a restaurant or serving some hot sauce on your cat's food, don't serve your feline family spicy food. Cats cannot process spicy flavors, and it can harm their digestive system and produce negative effects when they try to eat foods like hot dogs and other hot foods that have spices added to them.
Spicy foods can also cause pain and discomfort in cats' stomachs, and some cats may even experience vomiting, diarrhea or even worse if they have an allergic reaction. Instead of giving your kitty's stomach indigestion and discomfort, try serving them foods that are bland and balanced in their nutrient values to keep them feeling healthy and happy.
Now that you know all of these facts, keep these things in mind next time you interact with your feline friends. They're very intelligent, fun, and curious. Just be sure to remember that they have their own unique ways of communicating and making sure that you treat them accordingly.
If you're interested in learning more about cats, be sure to read through some previous articles that we have written about them, including The 10 Best Cat Toy Ideas and 10 Tips For Cat Parents. You can learn more from the experts and enjoy some quality time with your feline friends. We hope that these facts helped you better understand your feline family!

What is a Thanksgiving?
Thanksgiving is a holiday celebrated in the United States and Canada that is traditionally associated with the harvest and the fall season. It is a day to give thanks to the good things in life, including health, family, friends, neighbors, and the Earth.
As a result, Thanksgiving is a time when people come together, enjoy a meal, and reflect on their lives. It is a day that is celebrated by most Americans and sometimes called "thanksgiving" by others around the world.
At Thanksgiving, families and friends enjoy a large meal together, which usually includes turkey, stuffing, mashed potatoes, sweet potatoes, and cranberry sauce. The traditional side dishes or accompaniments are also some of the many other dishes that are often included, such as green beans, pumpkin pie, buttered sweet potatoes, rolls, cheese, and pecan pie.
In terms of the food, many people get creative when it comes to their dishes, and it has become fairly commonplace to try new and interesting takes on classic Thanksgiving recipes. Many families also share traditions or cultural dishes that represent themselves or their heritage.
What time does Thanksgiving Day usually fall?
Thanksgiving 2022 will fall on Thursday, November 24, according to this year's federal holiday schedule.
If Thanksgiving falls on Saturday, Sunday, or Monday, the official day off for the holiday is the following Monday.
In recent years, Thanksgiving has been celebrated in different cities around the United States over different dates. Because Thanksgiving is based on harvest times, the date of the holiday can vary depending on the seasons.
Which is the Thanksgiving Day?
According to the U.S. government, Thanksgiving is a national holiday that falls on the fourth Thursday in November. In addition to giving thanks for the current harvest, Americans celebrate Thanksgiving by gathering with loved ones, sharing a large meal, and giving thanks for blessings that they have received.
What are the traditions during Thanksgiving Day?

instruction: What type of soil is suitable for cactus?
output:
What type of soil is suitable for cactus?
The soil for a cactus collection will vary depending on what type of cactus you have in your collection. Generally, most cactus cultivars only need to have a soil that is slightly acidic, which has a pH level between 5.5 to 7.5. It may also be a good idea to add some extra nutrients to your cactus soil, since many cactus varieties become very root-bound as they get older. Some cactus cultivars should have a soil that is loamy and well-draining.
Do cacti die when you water them too much?
Watering a cactus too much can cause your cactus to die.
Water will allow oxygen to enter the roots of your cactus, which can help them grow. However, overwatering can cause water to sit in the soil for a long period. This will make the water turn to a solid state, which will prevent oxygen from getting to the roots. Also, overwatering can cause fungal diseases that attack the plant, and can eventually cause the entire cactus to rot. The ideal way to water a cactus is every other day, allowing the cactus to dry out between waterings.

instruction: What are some species of bears that are now extinct?
output:
What are some species of bears that are now extinct?
The following bears were once found in various areas around the world, but are no longer alive:
Amur grizzly, or Asian black bear (Ursus thibetanus)
Alaska brown bear (Ursus arctos middendorffi)
The southern giant panda (Ailuropoda maculata)
The Arctic grizzly bear (Ursus arctos maritimus)
The polar bear (Ursus maritimus)
What are some fun facts about pandas?
While they may be adorable, pandas are not actually bears. Theyre part of the raccoon family, known as the raccoon-dog group.
Pandas have no digestive acids in their stomachs  they rely on bacteria in their intestines to digest wood.
Both adult and juvenile pandas have spots. Adult pandas lose their spots as they age, while juveniles gain them.
The panda is an endangered species with just under a thousand living in the wild.
Pandas produce 99% of their own nutrients in a one-week gestation period, and they give birth to only one cub per year.
Pandas cant roar like lions or bears. Instead, they make a small whinny-like sound.
What are some fun facts about bears?
Although bears eat meat and vegetation, theyre carnivores because they have teeth that are well-suited for tearing and ripping rather than chewing.
While grizzly bears are the largest bear in North America, polar bears are the largest bear in the world.
While black bears have a reputation for being dangerous, only about one in 10,000 attacks by black bears results in the death of a human.
Most bears hibernate for up to seven months a year.
Hibernation is a complex physiological experience that causes a bear to slow its heartbeat, raise its body temperature, and lower its metabolism.
Scientists believe that bears have been around for about 20 to 25 million years.

instruction: What causes the northern lights?
output:
What causes the northern lights?
The aurora borealis, also commonly called the northern lights, is the result of particles in space, which are carried on the sun's magnetic field, hitting Earth's magnetic field, which creates an electrical current in the thin portion of Earth's ionosphere known as the F-layer, where the auroras usually occur.
The aurora borealis appears to be a light show in the sky because it's actually a light show of a different kind.
The glowing lights that we see in the night sky are known as aurora borealis. Auroras, as they are known, are the result of interactions between particles and electromagnetic radiation, primarily from the sun and the Earth's magnetic field as they collide across the upper atmosphere's ionosphere. They come to reside, sometimes for lengthy intervals, over regions known as auroral ovals, which tend to lie above the Arctic and Antarctic circles.
The aurora borealis usually occurs in two distinct forms: the northern lights and the southern lights.
They are not actually a light show to most people but a show that light up the sky at night.
There are some scientific discussions that have been made about them. Even today, scientists are not entirely sure how the northern lights work. The causes of the northern lights appear to be the combination of magnetosonic waves, which travel into the Earth's upper atmosphere from the sun, that create a charged plasma in space, and the Earth's magnetic field, which bends and amplifies these waves for some reason.
At first glance, an aurora may appear to be simply a beautiful swirl of light in the night sky. This alluring display is a result of an impressive light show taking place several hundred kilometers above the Earth's surface, in the region of an auroral oval, where the Northern Lights are born, according to space.com.
The beauty of this lightshow lies in the fact that the auroras exist in several different forms. Some look like swooshing curtains, some like the dancing northern lights, and some like a dazzling rainbow.
People have been enjoying these beautiful lights for a long time. Ancient cultures throughout the Northern Hemisphere believed the Aurora Borealis was the work of the gods and considered events in which this light phenomenon appeared to be a sign of their actions or blessings.
Auroras are visible on the northern side of the planet, and they occur as a result of solar activity. In general, the more intense solar activity, the greater the likelihood of aurora activity.
Sometimes, an unusually strong solar wind can cause a large aurora to take place. But this is not always the case. The colors of auroras appear to be due to the presence of gases such as methane and oxygen in Earth's upper atmosphere, which absorb energy to a varying degree, causing them to glow in different colors.
It really is the result of a beautiful, but complicated, interaction between Earth's magnetic field and cosmic particles.
It is well known that the northern lights are spectacular and mesmerizing displays of the night sky. But the fact that there are some dangers lurking above the Earth's atmosphere is not so well known. Auroras may be beautiful to watch, but the region above the earth where the auroras occur is dangerous for anyone planning to make a trip there.
If you plan to travel to this region and want to see the auroras, it is essential to learn how to recognize the signs of the auroras, where their maximum range is, what time of the day they are likely to occur, and what other safety issues to be aware of.
The people who plan to visit this region are advised not to travel by themselves, to be careful when using the light, and to have a full safety kit, including a flashlight, extra batteries, and warm clothing.
If you are planning your trip, be sure to check the aurora activity forecast and choose the best time to travel to the area and plan your journey well.
All in all, the beauty of watching the northern lights is beyond words. It makes people wonder as to how much more we don't know about the world around us. Auroras are one of the most beautiful sights that can be seen in any part of the world, and it is a sight to be seen by people who want to see it.

instruction: How do I clean my armpits?
output:
How do I clean my armpits? Is there something that I can use to clean my armpits without putting off men with unpleasant smells?’ I would like you to please stop asking questions that might scare or repel men in future. You can clean your armpits in many ways. You can use many types of soaps, sprays, washes, but I would suggest to keep it simple and use essential oils for the best results. Some of the essential oils that can give you the best clean armpits are:
Cedarwood essential oil
Rosemary essential oil
Essential oils have many benefits, one of them being the fact that it removes smells and keeps your skin fresh. There are also essential oils that have medicinal properties, and as we discussed earlier, men cannot smell the perfume or the scent but can feel the benefits. Here are some different ways of cleansing armpits, while keeping them smelling good and maintaining their skin’s natural oil balance.
Wash your armpits daily
You can wash your armpits using shampoo, soap, or a gentle cleanser, but these are not suitable for deep cleaning. For deep cleaning, you can use the following products, which would keep your armpits smelling fresh and clean without putting any harsh chemicals or products that may damage your skin:
To wash your armpits, you can mix the following 3 ingredients:
1 tablespoon warm water
1 tablespoon vinegar
1 teaspoon natural body wash or unfragmented soap
Mix all these ingredients well, and then gently wash your armpits with it, avoiding the hairy areas. Leave the mixture on the skin for a minute, and then take a clean towel and wipe the mixture off your armpit gently.
If you prefer, you can use a natural skin care product instead of shampoo. For example, Dr. Bronner’s Castile Soap, which is a natural skin wash for the armpits, but if you’re looking for something stronger, there is nothing that compares to shampoo, which is more than able to take care of your armpits in no time.
Cedarwood essential oil (1 drop)
Vitamin E oil (1/5 teaspoon)
1 tablespoon coconut oil
Dissolve the vitamin E oil in the coconut oil, and then add the cedarwood oil and mix it well. Then, apply this mixture to your armpits, and leave it on for a few minutes, and then wipe it off with a clean cloth or paper towel. You can use this mixture once or twice a week.
Cedarwood essential oil is a great thing to use, as it has a fresh and herbal scent, as well as many benefits. It helps to eliminate unpleasant odors, maintains the skin’s health and gives it a natural moisture, while keeping it clean. Many studies and doctors claim that cedarwood oil reduces inflammation, which is another reason to use it on your armpits.
Baking soda, essential oils and water
In a bowl, mix the baking soda, essential oils, and water, and stir it well.
Apply this mixture to your armpits and leave it on for a few minutes, rinse it off using water, and you will find noticeable and amazing results. Another great thing to use baking soda is that it removes dandruff, and it is excellent for cleansing armpit hair as it gently removes dead skin without damaging it.
You can use any flavor of Baking soda-based mixture that you like, such as Orange, Lavender, or Tea Tree essential oils and water for a fresh aroma. Essential oils are very good natural skin cleansers, and they also help to eliminate unpleasant odors.
Soap scrub/mixture
Making your own homemade soap that is gentle for cleansing your skin and armpits is an excellent option. You can make your soap yourself by buying organic glycerin and then add the following ingredients and making the foam.
2-3 tbsp of coconut oil
2 tbsp of castor oil
Add these ingredients to a container and mix well. Then, wait for it to warm and melt, and then add the water gradually, while stirring the mixture.
Once the soap gel has formed, you can spread it onto paper towels or a baking sheet, and let it cool, and then cut it in small pieces. You can store these in small containers for later use.
To use these soaps, you can massage them into your armpits with gentle, circular motions. Avoid scrubbing it severely, especially around the armpit hair areas. It is best to use this soap on a daily basis for a couple of weeks, which will help to get rid of any nasty, unpleasant odors and give your armpits an all-natural and healthy look.

instruction: How do I detail a car?
output:
How do I detail a car?
Here are some detailed instructions to document an automobile to get it ready for the auction:
Mark all parts, including the engine, exhaust system, body, accessories, and interior.
Take pictures of interior and exterior details.
Check for damage to doors, glass, upholstery and interior.
Make a comprehensive list of all parts and accessories to avoid misplacing them during the auction.
Make a list of all defects discovered.
Provide details of the car’s history and any significant work that has been done.
What is the best car to show for a car auction?
The Best Car To Show For A Car Auction Is: You want a car that is relatively valuable but relatively not too expensive. This will ensure that your car gets looked under by buyers and also show they are willing to go over the top to purchase the car.
What should a car appraiser look for?
An automobile appraiser should have a thorough knowledge of cars in all states of repair. This includes mechanical knowledge, bodywork, and interior conditions. The vehicle appraisal should include a close inspection of the exterior and interior of the car.
An appraisal of a vehicle begins with taking notes on all of the car’s exterior and interior features. The appraiser inspects the vehicle, noting any damage done to the paint or body panels. Appraisals involve a professional appraisal of the structure, function, and appearance of the vehicle.
An experienced car dealer will have specific car-related skills, including:
Have an eye for detail
Excellent critical thinking
Communication and negotiation skills
Be a fast learner and problem solver
An appraiser should have a strong background in mechanics. This is crucial because the appraiser needs to know what is under the hood of a vehicle. The mechanic should have a good understanding of the engine and how it works with other parts.
What is a vehicle appraisal report?
A car appraisal report is an independent professional opinion on the value of a vehicle. It includes details on the car such as the make, model, age, mileage, colors, and conditions. It will also include information on the condition of the car, including the state of the engine, interior, and body repair.
The appraiser will complete the appraisal, evaluating the vehicle, and then provide a written report of the results. This appraisal report is a legal document that can be used in legal proceedings regarding the purchase of the car.
What should a car appraisal be like?
The car appraisal report should be comprehensive, detailed, and precise. The report should include as many details as possible regarding the car’s condition, value, and history. These details should be accompanied by photographs or drawings of the car or its components.
The appraisal should also include the appraisal date, the appraiser’s signature, the appraiser’s business name, and the appraiser’s full contact information.
How can I obtain a car appraisal report?
A car appraiser can find a car appraisal report online, at a certified appraisal company or an appraisal body. The appraiser will contact you and take a detailed car history and condition of those, then will go on to appraise the car’s value.
Appraisals can be conducted on-site or off-site and usually cost between $500-$2,000.
What is a vehicle inspection report?
A vehicle inspection report is a comprehensive assessment of the condition and mechanical state of a car. It’s usually done during an appraisal or after a car purchase to ensure that the vehicle is free of any technical flaws or defects.
The report should include as much information as possible about the car’s condition, including the body, engine, and other mechanical components. Also, the report will provide the date and the appraisal method that was used.
What should a vehicle inspection report contain?
A vehicle inspection report should provide:
Detailed descriptions of the vehicle and any major defects or problems.
Details of any major repairs or modifications made to the car.
The condition of the tires, brakes, and other technical parts of the car.
The car’s history and any relevant information.
A summary describing the overall condition of the vehicle.
The complete report should be presented in a professional and visually appealing format to facilitate the customer’s understanding of the vehicle status.
How is a car inspection report used?
The information and data contained in the inspection report are crucial for identifying and quantifying any mechanical or appearance defects of a car. A vehicle inspection report is used on an appraisal, or a pre-purchase examination.
The report is submitted to the client/buyer of a car who is seeking to make the right choices when it comes to the car.
Car appraisals can be expensive, but it’s a significant investment that helps protect a person’s property values. Appraisals provide information that allows you to make informed and rational decisions on buying a car. To ensure

instruction: I am going to make pumpkin pie for the first time.  Can you help me?
output:
I am going to make pumpkin pie for the first time.  Can you help me? 

A: *

*You need to make sure to start with a clean work area - wipe down counter/table/pots/plates/silverware/toothbrushes/etc until clean, or even better, wash and dry everything that might be used for making the pie before beginning. 

*Powder sugar is just finely ground sugar, so you can use any type you have on hand.

*You'll need a food processor, which can make things much faster and easier. If you don't have one, you can use a heavy-duty mortar and pestle, and grind the spices and nuts with a fork until they are a coarse paste.

*In the food processor, process the spices and nuts until the texture is a fine powder mixture.

*Add in the pumpkin puree or canned pumpkin, then pulse to combine. Add in the spices and nuts, then pulse again.

*Squeeze in the lime juice and sweetener, and pulse a few more times to combine.


If you've never made pumpkin pie from a can, this is the recipe I generally use - it's easier, and it's not as "authentic," but it tastes great!

A: It is an easy recipe to follow. You get a nice and delicious dessert. The only thing you should prepare is a food processor, sugar, pumpkin puree, spice (such as cinnamon, nutmeg, clove and ginger), a tablespoon of lime juice, and coconut sugar. The amount of coconut sugar you want would depend on how you like the dessert. (You can also replace the coconut sugar with brown sugar).
Now, take a metal bowl (that has not been used before), and pour the 2 cups of pumpkin pure into it. You can also add 1-2 tablespoon of lime juice, coconut sugar, and some spices (cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, and ginger). Toss the mixture until it mixes well. Once it mixes well, put some salt in it, and mix it. Now, take a spoon and make two or three holes in the top of the mixture. Be careful not to break the mixture. Next, you should put some water on a bottom part of the bowl or you can put a metal lid to the bottom part of the bowl and it won't drip. Put it in the freezer for 40-60 minutes. Afterwards, you should take it from the freezer, slice two large slices of the parchment paper, and put them on a table. Pour the mixture on the top of the parchment. Be sure to cover the entire surface area with the mixture. You need to spread it evenly as much as you can. Finally, put the whole thing in the freezer for 40-60 minutes. After, you should take it out, put it on a plate, throw it in the oven and bake it at 350-400 degrees Fahrenheit for 35 minutes to an hour. When done, your dessert is ready.
Enjoy!  Try the recipe at home.

instruction: What kind of foods do they eat in Thailand
output:
What kind of foods do they eat in Thailand? Thai cuisine is famous for its spicy flavours, rich smells and aromatic ingredients. But besides hot and spicy cuisine, Thai food also includes fresh ingredients, seafood and vegetarian dishes.
Common dishes and ingredients include:
Tom Yum, a light, pungent and refreshing soup made with lemongrass, coriander, chillies and tamarind
Tom Kha soup, a mild sweet and sour Thai fish soup
Pad Thai, a crispy and spicy stir-fried noodle dish
Mango Sticky Rice, known for the sweet and tangy taste of freshly-pulped mangoes and sticky rice
Khao Pad Thai, a healthier version of Pad Thai that is made with tofu
Lamp Ruea, a Thai hot pot dish made with mushrooms, green beans, glass noodles, and stir-fried meats like pork, chicken and beef
Phad Krut, a curry made with duck meat, coconut milk, and aromatic herbs
Longevity Noodles, a soup of wheat flour noodles, tofu and green vegetables made for longevity and health
Hun Yai, thin slices of pork or chicken fried in a fragrant black bean sauce
Tom Yum Goong, a savoury, fiery and fragrant seafood soup made with lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, peanuts and fish, shrimp or prawns.
Mango Sticky Rice (Photo: Unsplash)
What do Thais eat for breakfast in Thailand? Breakfast is just as important as it is in other cultures and Thai people believe the morning meal is the first and most significant meal of the day.
Thai breakfast food is typically made of a hot, sweet soup or soup-like dish. These often include a rice bowl served with soup, fish, meat, herbs and fresh greens.
For breakfast, the most common dishes are:
Khana Sai, a traditional hearty breakfast dish of rice, stir-fried vegetables, meat or fish, and various ingredients
Panna Dao, a stir-fried omelette dish
Tham Nang Pork, spicy pork in banana leaf
Mamuang, or mango pancakes, a Thai dessert made with flour, sugar, eggs, ghee and fresh mango
Cha Muang, fried rice made with various greens, egg and spices.
What is the national drink of Thailand? Beer and alcohol is legal in Thailand, as well as non-alcoholic beverages. However, the national drink of Thailand is a refreshing and cool drink called Thai iced tea also known as Chay or Mas Krob.
There are many different variations of Thai iced tea, such as Mango and Strawberry iced tea that are common Thai desserts. It is typically made with sweet, strong black tea, condensed milk and topped with a small amount of sweetened condensed milk, and sugar.
Where do Thais get their water and electricity? Water in Thailand is readily available and readily available from mains supply. Electricity, on the other hand, is powered by fossil fuels which are abundant in this country.
Water is generally safe to drink and the standard of public sanitation and cleanliness is high. However, it always best to check with hotel, restaurant and public health officials about the water quality in certain areas or locations.
The city of Lopburi
Thailand was not always a safe country to travel in as it was subject to political and social unrest in the past. Things may have changed significantly, though, and many travellers, especially tourists, continue to visit, explore and enjoy the countrys stunning beauty, food and cultural delights.
Still, it is essential to research your destination and learn more about the culture so you can travel the country safe and sound.

Read more about what to see and where to go.
Use a mobile travel guide app like TripLizard to help you explore and find what interests you
Keep your valuables in a safe place in your hotel or accommodation.
Follow the law, dress modestly, and respect the culture and traditions
Travel in groups or avoid solo travel if possible.

While Thailand is mostly popular for its beautiful beaches, shopping malls, lush rainforests and temple sites, there is still so much that you can find out about its culture and traditions.
Here are 10 unusual or fascinating facts and information about Thailand that you might not know:

output:
What are some good browser alternatives to Chrome?
Chromium browser is the open source project, which Chrome and the Opera Browser are based upon. The Opera browser's next version, Opera Quantum, is based on Chromium.
In this section, I'll provide some recommendations for browser alternatives to Google Chrome.
I have included browsers in this list which feature minimal browser extensions and plugins support to avoid compatibility issues, and which rely upon latest Chromium and WebKit engines to ensure fast and stable performance.
To know more about these browsers, I have provided some detail information.
Opera, formerly a free web browser, has always been focused on security. It includes unique features, which include SpeedDial, Pop-up Blocker, and a Tab view.
Opera Web Browser has recently been made available as a Chromium-based browser instead of its own native engine. It has already received several patches for compatibility issues and supports newer versions of Chrome extensions too.
Besides, it was the first browser to incorporate AdBlock, an ad blocker.
The Opera Browser is now called "Opera Chromium" and it has a more simplified user interface. It is a simple and light weight browser for the desktop, but also has a mobile app.
Opera is one of the best options for privacy. It has a built-in ad blocker and a privacy-preserving mode which automatically blocks tracking cookies.
While Chromium-based, it is also one of the browsers that do not require additional plugins.
The Opera browser is a great alternative to Google Chrome.
It provides several great features such as:
Minimal ad tracking
WebRTC support
Opera can make your work easy by including:
Speed-Dial
Quickly access frequently visited websites
Opera has fast and stable browsing performance with a simple and easy-to-use interface.
It also offers numerous customization options, including the option to install an ad-blocker of your preference, such as uBlock Origin, AdBlock and more.
Opera Chromium has a built-in AdBlock feature that will block and show notification when websites used ad blockers.
Developed by developers whose aim is to provide a faster, more reliable web browser that also incorporates security features.
The browser supports the Chrome web store, giving easy access to any web app, add-on or plugin from Google Chrome.

It has a wide range of customizable features. One interesting feature is the option of a keyboard shortcuts (via Shift+Tab or Tab) to enable users to open or close tabs without having to move the mouse or use a mouse gesture.
It has its own custom, customizable user interface called the "tab bar," which provides users with options to show or hide tabs, or sort them by date, title, and width.
The browser is based on Chromium technology, which is a good plus point for the Vivaldi browser as it benefits from the best browser engine technologies on the market.
Vivaldi is optimized for the display and uses the latest technologies on web browsers, providing a high-quality and speedy browsing experience.
Vivaldi Web Browser supports many Chrome extensions, including uBlock Origin and AdBlock, which are some of the best ad blockers around.
Additionally, the browser features a custom tab manager that keeps the browser organized.
You can install and uninstall tabs and then add shortcuts to your launcher to access them quickly.
Vivaldi is a powerful web browser that is ideal for those people who want to customize their web experience.
The Vivaldi Web Browser is an alternative to Google Chrome, which will provide a faster and more secure experience.
It offers several features and customization alternatives.
The browser provides a minimalistic user interface and supports many of the extensions that are available on Google Chrome.
Vivaldi is well-supported by its community, and it is being consistently enhanced over the time. The Vivaldi browser is one of the best alternatives that can be used as an alternative to Google Chrome.
The Vivaldi browser is a free, open-source and ad-free browser that is excellent for privacy and security.
