instruction: How do I make escargot?
output:
How do I make escargot?
Here at The Daily Dish we have a few different ways to cook up some delicious escargot!
If you don’t have a whole roast chicken it’s better to cut the breastbone from the chicken & remove any fat and skin. Reserve the carcass but not the bones because they’ll add more flavor to the chicken soup.
Place the roasting pan & chicken carcass in a large stockpot & add enough water to cover everything by at least 6 inches. Add a couple of bay leaves, a few peppercorns, a couple of carrots, a couple of onions, a celery root about the size of a softball & a few potatoes. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer & cook until the chicken and vegetables are tender, at least 3 hours & up to 6 or more hours. The longer it cooks the better the soup will be.
Once it’s done, using a slotted spoon remove the chicken from the broth, reserving the broth. Let sit in the refrigerator overnight to let it cool enough to remove the fat & skin. Once it’s cold, remove the skin and bones & shred the meat into large chunks.
Put the leftover chicken & roasted vegetables in a large pot & add enough of the hot chicken broth to cover everything by about 6 or 8 inches. Add about 2 c. of rice, & cook until the rice is done, approximately 20-25 minutes. Stir once or twice to be sure the rice isn't sticking, but don't stir it too much or it will fall apart. If the broth gets too low, add more chicken broth.
When the rice is cooked, stir in the shredded breast meat & the sour cream until it’s all mixed well. If it’s too thin, add more soup until it’s to your liking.
Serve right away with toasted pita bread or crusty french bread for the best results.
Serve with toasted bread, crusty french bread, or slices of sourdough.
1. Remove any stones & shells from the shellfish.
2. In a cast iron or heavy skillet, heat about 1 tbsp of butter over medium high heat. Add as many of the shellfish as you want, one at a time, being careful not to overcrowd the skillet. Season with a bit of salt & pepper, and cook for about 4 minutes on each side until lightly crispy & golden brown.
3. Repeat as many times as you want. Don't overcrowd the skillet or you won't get any crispy bits.
Serve with your favorite toast, on a bed of lettuce & dressed with a lemon cream sauce.
1. Clean the garlic by slicing just one clov away from the top (it doesn't need to be peeled) to expose the flesh, but don't let it touch the rest of the clove or it will burn or burn your hands.
2. Melt butter in a small skillet over low heat.
3. Add lemon juice to the butter, stirring until it’s all incorporated.
4. Add garlic & stir to make sure the butter & garlic are coated.
5. Cook for about a minute and your garlic butter will be ready. Put it in a small pot or ramekin.
6. Toss together the cooked garlic butter, chopped parsley & dry bread crumbs.
7. Melt a bit more butter in a small skillet & add the bread crumb & parsley mixture, stir occasionally until it's all coated in butter.
8. Place the bread crumbs & parsley on a baking sheet, spread out evenly, and bake for around 8-10 minutes until the bread crumbs are golden. Remove from oven and let cool.
9. Drain the escargot gently, without over-squeezing any of the juices away. Add a bit of salt & white wine & let them marinade for a few minutes in the hot salt & wine mixture, being careful not to overcook.
10. Heat the garlic butter on medium high heat in a small skillet, being careful not to let it burn.
11. Add escargot to the skillet & cook until all sides are nicely browned with the garlic butter.
12. Serve warm, garnished with the parsley & bread crumbs if desired.

instruction: Hi, I have some falafel, but no tahini to put on them. Can you give me a recipe for making tahini?
output:
Hi, I have some falafel, but no tahini to put on them. Can you give me a recipe for making tahini? Can you do it on the stove, or do I need to use a food processor?
Can you give me a head’s up what type and how much salt to use?
Yes, you can make tahini by blitzing the sesame seeds with a little olive oil and a pinch of salt in a food processor. Then, you can add the tahini to your meal and let the food processor continue, blending, and blending until it becomes a thick paste (just like the grocery store version).
Tahini is made from ground sesame seeds, and when blended with a little bit of water they become a thick, smooth paste that’s rich in unsaturated fatty acids and protein (but not much in carbohydrates).
As for the amount of salt, I suggest you add a pinch to taste. Just a touch really – like you’d add salt to soup. Adding it is optional, but it does help to bring out the flavor in the tahini.

instruction: Should I get my children a nanny? I'm so exhausted.
output:

Yes, especially if you work and don't want to do it on your own. If you are working and not really enjoying it or don't have a support system then getting help can make all the difference. Just know that it takes time to find the right one, I have a few recommendations, but be very clear with them about expectations, communication, the schedule you have. Do not feel guilty about having your children helped, it improves their lives too, they have a full time caretaker, they have more fun, play with more people etc.
What are some ways to maintain sanity while on maternity leave?
My babies are 5 and almost 3. Should I move them back into my room, or not?
Not. They'll just get into everything and do what they can to get out of it, they'll ruin your things without meaning to and it will be a huge waste of your time and energy. Put them in the nursery or guest room until they are at least 2, then try giving them small pieces of their bed they are comfortable with. After that if they can't sleep in their room without their parent then take it as they can stay out. You have to do what works for your house, your family and your needs. If you need some more advice feel free to share your bedroom arrangement.
What should I do? The father of my child thinks we should not adopt and I disagree. It has to be a joint decision, whether it's a father of your child or not, it's not right for just one person to decide. In terms of the situation you are going through, it's important for you to be as informed as possible about these matters. Consult your local adoption agency for more information on how the process works, what documents you need. This will help you to make informed decisions after getting all the relevant information.
Are there any other tips for mommies who have baby #3?
Don't give it all up, but be honest. Get some help. That depends on your situation, if you have help your can enjoy more and if not make some, it's okay to ask for help and it is okay to have fun with it too.
The NICU Nurses and Doctors are awesome!
The babies are tiny, they have no hair, they are blue, or look like little alien creatures.
When they come home they are so much bigger, they have their hair so full, their color is changing. They are all so different. It's not the same baby that was in the NICU, they are all so beautiful and amazing.
NICU's are places of miracles, people overcome obstacles to survive.

instruction: When was Canada colonized?
output:
When was Canada colonized?
When was Toronto first founded?
The first European settlers arrived in Canada during the early 16th century. After France and Britain battled for control of the region, Canada became a British colony called New France and subsequently was ruled by France until 1763 when it was ceded to Britain in the Treaty of Paris.
1837. The Rebellions of 1837 led by the rebellious Upper Canada and Lower Canada, and organized to gain independence from British rule....Key dates.
1759 First British occupation of Quebec
1763 Treaty of Paris ends French and Indian war
1775 Quebec Act
1791 Quebec Act becomes law of Upper Canada as well
Who colonized Canada
Canada was officially part of Britain's Empire in the 1500s, and England claimed a lot of land in what we now call Canada. The French had claimed land in Canada for a while, but they lost to the British in the Seven Year's War.
Who first colonized Canada?
The first people known to have lived in what became Canada were the Paleo-Indians, who entered into the continent from Alaska via the continental ice-sheet about 13,000 years ago. The first European settlers arrived in Canada during the early 16th century.

Productivity Gaps.

Unemployment Rate. 5.
Who conquered Canada?

How many years did Canada wait to become independent?
By the Treaty of Paris on September 3, 1763, France ceded possession and sovereignty of all its territories south of the Great Lakes to Britain, which had already controlled the northern part of Canada via a series of treaties. The British also established a colony in Nova Scotia (called Acadia by the French).
How many years did it take for Canada to become a country?
On September 28, 1867, a long-awaited Canadian constitution was ratified, making Canada the last of the four original British North American colonies to become a sovereign country.

instruction: How can I  use my phone less?
output:
How can I  use my phone less?

• Set realistic habits and goals. Make a plan and a schedule for daily use (including times of the day when you are not connected).

• Set a rule for your phone, like "no texting during conversations or meals," or "use your phone only for work or entertainment."

• Turn off notifications from non-essential apps (like Facebook or Twitter) to minimize the feeling of being constantly connected.

• Take breaks—walk away from your phone, go for a walk, or do something else to relax.

• Be selective about the apps you download. Turn off notifications on apps you don't need.

• Give yourself a phone-free zone. Schedule times when you will be disengaged from your phone, like during the dinner hour or on weekends.

CHAPTER 10

_**Take Care of Yourself**_

**The Body, Mind, and Spirit Connection**

_How can I  maintain overall physical well-being?_

Physical health is a basic need, and taking good care of yourself is important for your mental and emotional health as well. Take a few steps to live a healthy lifestyle and follow through with regular physical exercise and healthy eating.

• Work out regularly. Exercise releases endorphins, your body's natural mood enhancers. Exercise can be as easy as going for a walk or taking the stairs instead of the elevator. Engage in regular activities like jogging or swimming.

• Eat balanced meals. Focus on whole foods such as fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. Balance your diet with healthy snacks like fruits, nuts, and yogurt.

• Adopt healthy habits. Make sure to get enough sleep, limit your caffeine and alcohol consumption, and avoid smoking and addictive substances.

• Take care of your body. Take care of your skin with good hygiene practices that include regular bathing, shaving, and moisturizing.

• Stay hydrated. Carry a water bottle with you at all times so you can stay hydrated.

• Get enough rest. Make sure that you get seven or more hours of sleep each night.

• Manage stress through relaxation, such as deep breathing, visualization, meditation, or yoga, or you can consider seeing a professional to work through stress.

• Take medications as prescribed. Follow your physician's advice on all your medical treatments, including taking medications, exercise, and lifestyle changes.

_How can I  improve my sleep?_

Sleep is essential for our health and well-being. The quality of your sleep is correlated with your overall health, mood, and cognitive function, and can affect your level of productivity, focus, and alertness. Here's what you can do:

• Make sure you have a consistent bedtime. Keeping to a consistent sleep schedule can help keep your sleep patterns on a schedule.

• Eliminate external stimuli. Turn off electronics an hour beforehand and avoid watching late-night TV, as the screen can disrupt the body's natural sleep cycle.

• Create a relaxing bedroom setting. Make your bedroom quiet, cool, and dark.

• Exercise before bed. It can be hard to get to sleep when you're stressed out. Exercise, especially yoga or Pilates, can help to calm your mind and can make it easier to sleep.

• Limit caffeine and alcohol intake, particularly earlier in the day before bed.

• Practice meditation, deep breathing exercises, or yoga prior to bed to help you relax and fall asleep.

• Consider working with a sleep specialist. They can help identify and correct sleeping problems relating to lifestyle factors, medications, or health conditions.

_How can I  maintain a healthy lifestyle, especially if I have chronic pain?_

It's important to maintain a healthy lifestyle even if you have medical conditions like back pain, arthritis, or osteoporosis. Here are some tips for living a productive and pain-free life:

• Find ways to move your body regularly. Walking, swimming, or cycling can provide physical exercise and movement without causing a flare-up or aggravating your condition.

• Consider a massage, chiropractic treatment, or physical therapy. A session with a therapist can help reduce pain, improve your range of motion, and promote overall physical health.

• Avoid stretching too far, especially if you're experiencing pain. Hold stretches until pain is tolerable, and then slowly release.

• Limit your time on your feet, using a footrest to elevate your feet during periods when lying down or sitting down might not be possible.

• Maintain a healthy diet. Eat a balanced meal with lean proteins, healthy fats, fiber, and fruits and vegetables.

• Follow a regular sleep schedule. This helps regulate

instruction: What is Gremolata?
output:
What is Gremolata? It’s a combination of herbs that are often chopped and mixed with lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil (sometimes wine) to garnish steaks, roasted meats, or pasta dishes. It is said to bring a vibrant burst of flavors to dishes and it really helps to add a pop of acidity and brightness to any savory dishes.
We know what Gremolata is now — or at least we know what it’s supposed to be. So how do we make it?
Ingredients for Gremolata
Gremolata is typically made with a mixture of three ingredients:
Juice of one lime or lemon.
Small slices of lemon or lime.
Finely chopped garlic.
Finely chopped fresh herbs such as oregano or parsley.
Some recipes will also include thinly sliced green onions, but many prefer to not use them — it depends on your personal taste.
Finely chop all of the ingredients and mix together until they are well combined. You can store any extra gremolata in a jar or ramekin in the refrigerator for up to two weeks. It can be whisked together with oil or used on roasted or grilled meat, cheese plates, or pasta dishes.
Gremolata is meant to provide a refreshing burst of acidity, so be sure to balance it out with a salt or spice to help balance the flavors.
The original gremolata was created in Tuscany, Italy — a region known for its delectable dishes. It’s often used as a finishing touch or complement for roasted meats or veal, such as a roast leg of lamb or veal roast. But it can be added to any dish to give it a pop of vibrant flavor.
Gremolata can also be made in advance, and you only need to blend them together and add some salt and oil or vinegar in advance of serving to have these vibrant flavors ready to spice up your dish.
If you’re making gremolata for steak or roast lamb, add it the last 15 minutes or so. The acid in gremolata will break down the meat’s collagen, helping to prevent the dish from drying out or becoming tough.
Gremolata is typically served in small pieces, such as pinches or chunks, to add a burst of flavor.
Keep in mind that the more herbs you use, the stronger the flavor will be. Start with a small amount, and adjust as needed.
You can also experiment with adding other herbs or spices, such as thyme or rosemary, or even adding in a sprinkle of pepper for a kick. Mix and match flavors to your liking.
Gremolata serves two main roles in cooking: It can be used to garnish or add additional flavor to a dish, as well as to help keep the meat tender and juicy.
For most people, the traditional gremolata would be served on the side and mixed in after the meat is cooked. To prevent the herbs from getting mushy and losing flavor, the mix is usually added before serving.
Gremolata can also be combined with olive oil or lemon juice to form a marinade or sauce where it can be used as a basting sauce to season meat dishes.
Overall, gremolata is one of the most versatile and flavorful additions to any dish. You can try your own blend of fresh herbs, and add your own unique spin to your menu.
Where to get Gremolata?
Gremolata is typically made using fresh herbs, citrus fruits, and garlic and can be made right at home using the recipes below.
However, you can also find it in many grocery stores and delicatessens, but it’s usually sold ready-made, which means that it might be more expensive than making it yourself.
Ready-made Gremolata is available from:
The Grom
If you can’t find gremolata in your local stores, follow these simple step-by-step instructions to make your own.
How To Make Gremolata at Home
1. First, you will need to slice your herbs and citrus fruits. If you can, try to use a mandoline or microplane for the best results — it will get even, consistent slices of vegetables like carrots, zucchini, or asparagus.
2. Next, take three or four medium-sized tablespoons of your chosen fresh herbs. Add in the juice of half a grapefruit, half a lime, and half a lemon, and pour the mixture over the herbs.
3. Gently mash the salt and mixture under the mixture of citrus and herbs with a fork to get a puree-like texture.
4. Finally, taste the gremolata and adjust if necessary. If it is too acidic or bitter or if it’s

instruction: what should i build a cabin out of?
output:
what should i build a cabin out of?
One can build a cabin out of many materials, so the question of ‘what should I build a cabin out of?’ can sometimes be a trick question.
However, there are some basic materials commonly used to build cabins.
Before we discuss specific materials, let’s discuss the pros and cons of each one.
We’ll also take a look at the costs, so you can decide which one would be the best option for you.
Wood is most commonly used to build cabins, particularly softwoods such as cedar, pine, spruce, and fir. Wood is a good options because it is easy to work, offers natural beauty, adds warmth to a cabin, and is versatile enough to be used in many construction projects.
A disadvantage, however, is that wood is susceptible to mildew, insects, and weather conditions. The cost of wood also depends on various factors, such as size, species, and where it was harvested.
On average, steel framed cabins are often preferred by many homeowners looking to build a cabin because of durability and strength. Steel is an excellent choice for outdoor construction projects and it is very strong and fireproof. It also provides better insulation and energy efficiency than most wooden structures.
Nevertheless, steel is not eco-friendly, and it is not a very aesthetic choice. Moreover, the cost is significantly higher as compared to wooden, which is a significant disadvantage.
Cabin frames made out of bamboo are an excellent eco-friendly choice because they are made from sustainable, fast-growing bamboo. They are also lightweight, easy to install, and provide better insulation than steel. However, bamboo is often more expensive than other wood choices.
Stone and bricks are another good option for cabin construction. They are extremely durable, sustainable, and long-lasting, and they come in various sizes and shapes. Building a cabin with stones and bricks can even make it look unique and stylish.
Cabinets built out of stone or bricks are also insulated, which is an advantage for those looking for a warm and comfortable cabin. However, you’ll want to be careful when building a cabin made out of stone and bricks as they can be heavy, and construction efforts will be expensive.
Concrete is another excellent choice for cabin construction, and it is a good option for those who want a unique and aesthetic cabin.
Concrete is incredibly strong and versatile, and it can be made into various shapes and sizes.
In addition, concrete is long-lasting, durable, and provides better insulation than wood. However, concrete cabins can be challenging to install, and it costs significantly higher as compared to other cabin materials.
If you’re looking for a rustic, log cabin feel, logs look like a perfect choice for a structure. As the name suggests, logs are cut logs that have been turned into lumber, but log construction is not as commonly used as other materials in cabin building.
A key advantage of logs is their unique and rustic look, and they are sustainable, eco-friendly, and make the cabin warmer. In addition, log cabins are known for their outstanding insulation, which is an advantage for winter construction.
On the downside, logs are generally more expensive than most materials, and the installation process involves a skilled carpenter.
If you’re looking to build a cabin on a budget, you can decide from the more affordable and easily attainable materials, which include plastic materials, polycarbonate, and PVC.
PVC or polyvinyl chloride is another popular choice for cabin construction.
While PVC is more expensive than many other materials, it is eco-friendly, durable, and long-lasting, and it can be easily molded into various shapes and sizes.
Polycarbonate or clear plastic sheets are another cheap and easy-to-use cabin material.
Polycarbonate is a durable material that’s good for outdoor construction, and it provides excellent insulation and sun protection. It is also a good choice for cabin construction, as it is lightweight, and easily attachable.
The final choice will depend on your budget, style, and location of the site.
However, a common factor is that you will want to make sure that the cabin you choose can stand up to weather conditions, as most cabins are exposed to weather elements.
While you can build a cabin out of many materials, wood, steel, bamboo, stone, bricks, and concrete are commonly used for cabin building, providing a unique style of cabin depending on your preferences, budget, and location.
Cabin Porn is where to find ideas for timber cabins. Pinterest, Instagram, and Houzz are some of the popular sites where a cabin search can be found.
You’ll want to choose materials that suit your budget and style, depending on where your cabin is located because different materials have an influence on the time of construction, and also the site, which is a factor as timber is very heavy, and might be impossible to move.

instruction: Why do a lot of Scientists not believe in God or Satan?
output:
Why do a lot of Scientists not believe in God or Satan?
The Christian god has very little basis for existence, as has already been pointed out, and I would just say that it’s interesting how the idea of a god is like the idea of the supernatural, and these can all be explained with the laws of physics we understand.
So here’s a list of reasons why many scientists, such as Richard Dawkins and other prominent intellectuals and atheists, do not believe in the supernatural. Again, these reasons apply to all religions that have supernatural claims.
1. Scientific Evidence
What is the scientific evidence that supports the idea of God or other forms of the supernatural? None.
So, scientists don’t believe in supernatural beings like gods simply because there is no scientific evidence for their existence. There is no scientific method that could discover a god, angel, or demon. There are no laboratory, microscope, telescope, or computer that would allow you to observe anything that might resemble these beings. It is therefore necessary to have a “non-scientific” method to justify these beings, such as faith, and this is an implicit statement that the idea of a supernatural being is not scientific.
2. Incredulity toward supernatural claims
All scientists know that the nature is full of mysteries, and that there are things we do not understand yet. But this does not mean that they deny that we are limited in our knowledge.
It’s not inconceivable that in the future there may be evidence of the existence of supernatural beings that we can’t explain or observe through scientific methods. However, this is not a strong enough reason for scientists to abandon their commitment to scientific methods, i.e. to not accept anything that cannot be tested or verified.
Furthermore, it is true that there are instances of phenomena that cannot be explained through scientific methods. For example, there may be cases of miracles. However, any investigation of a possible miracle would not involve supernatural phenomena, but the manipulation of existing and known processes and laws of the universe.
3. Reason cannot be overruled
There is no reason to believe in supernatural beings or forces. The principles of logically reasoned argument and evidence support only that which can be explained by known natural processes.
4. No direct experience
God, angels, and demons are not experienced directly by humans except through the senses or emotions. This makes them unverifiable hypotheses, and therefore not scientifically testable. Therefore, they do not belong to the realm of science, but fall outside it.
This does not mean that scientists are totally insensitive to the experiences of others. What scientists require is a more plausible explanation than any other. If someone wants to tell you of their personal experiences, they must submit those experiences to the critical examination and analysis of others.
5. The concept of a supernatural deity is contradictory
God, in particular, is often depicted as a being possessing perfect qualities such as omnipotence, omniscience, and omnipresence. And it is believed that these perfect qualities exist beyond the understanding of humanity.
But then how can there be a concept of a god? Would not such a god be an incomplete concept, by definition, since it would be lacking in certain aspects? Moreover, if God is fully perfect, why would he interfere in the world in any case? In fact, if it is so perfect, it should not be bothered with such things that concern humans or anything that can be known or experienced by humans. And if there is not a God, then who are you as a human being to declare yourself as a supreme being?
Finally, what if God is actually imperfect? What happened to the concept of God as perfect when he or she intervenes? Do you not believe in the notion of perfection as a divine quality? It would be more acceptable to believe in a God that has a finite level of power if this is known to exist. But that’s not what’s been presented to humans so far.
6. Scientific Method
The scientific method involves the careful observation and logical analysis of empirical data. Scientific research relies on the rigorous testing of hypotheses. Scientists are not allowed to disregard any evidence or claim as scientific if it cannot be replicated, or does not follow from the available evidence.
To do everything with faith and unscientific argument is considered irrelevant to modern science. Therefore, faith is not a scientific, logical, or scientific answer to any question or an alternative for scientific methods.
7. Scientific Religions are Impossible
The problem with religions that assume scientific claims is quite obvious. When a religious figure or prophet makes a statement, this statement should be verified and examined scientifically. If it does not fit what we know through science, then this is the moment to abandon the story or religion.
Religious leaders must explain their views within the context of contemporary science. That means changing their teachings, as they must be consistent with scientific research. Religious figures who refuse

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mauritian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Mine Frite?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mauritian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Mine Frite?
There are various recipes for mine frite. Here is one:
Mix all together 500 g of flour, 100 g of sugar, 2 eggs, 200 ml of oil or melted butter. Add ½ cup (125 ml) of warm water, and slowly mix until all is well blended. You can then cook to make cakes or pies.
Mauritius is an island nation located in the Indian Ocean, off the east coast of Africa, near Mauritius (Photo by Akshay Rajput from Pexels)
I love baking and have recently bought a cookbook packed with African foods, so I’m keen on trying some Mauritian dishes. Do you have any recommendations?
Mauritius, a former British colony, is part of the African continent, although it is an island nation. You can try these Mauritian dishes (all vegan by the way):
Mauritian Creole curry (a chicken or vegetable curry), as it’s an essential flavour mix of sweet and sour, with fresh lemon, lime, and tamarind.
Foie Gras (stuffed and roasted mushrooms) — a popular dish enjoyed during Mauritius’s traditional festivals.
Breadfruit fritters — these are tasty, savoury snacks made with breadfruit (also known as Tami or Breadfruit).
Briyani / Lamb curry — with the combination of the herbs, spices, ginger, and onions, a flavourful and moist curried meat dish, which will leave you with a taste of Mauritius.
A Mauritian dish (Photo by from Pexels)
I live in Melbourne with no opportunity to cook Mauritian dishes at the moment. How do I go about trying them when I can’t do it myself?
Don’t worry if you’re in Melbourne, and there is a Mauritian community there that brings Mauritian food to the streets of Melbourne. Here are some options:
Mauritian Food Market – this market runs from May to September at the Melbourne Food and Wine Festival (The Melbourne Showgrounds, Show Ring, 333 Spencer St, Hawthorn, VIC 3122).
Mauritius Marketplace – it’s a market that brings together authentic Mauritian food and handmade handicrafts, located all year around at the Melbourne market (The Market, 136 Gertrude St Footscray, Vic 3011).
Mauritius Cuisine Australia – this society can provide you with a list of Mauritian restaurants that serve Mauritian food.
Cerises des Bois – this is a Mauritian food delivery service, catering to many different suburbs in Melbourne including Footscray, Hawthorn, North Melbourne, and Melbourne CBD. (823 High Street, Hawthorn, Vic 3122, Australia).
There are no restaurants nearby, and my kids and wife would love trying Mauritian dishes and other African dishes. What are some African dishes they might enjoy?
There are numerous African dishes you can try, although some of the spicy and hot dishes may not be suitable for everyone, and they are not vegan. Here are some African dishes that are easy to prepare with my suggestion of ingredients:
Tembo Salad – a spicy but refreshing noodle salad made with coconut milk and mixed with bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and fresh mint leaves.
Senegalese Cassoulet – made with lentils, onions, and spices baked in a pot until a delicious stew, it’s a wholesome and tasty dish.
West African Mafio – made with lentils, onions, tomato paste, and various meats, which can be a filling dish.
Samboussakis – a traditional Greek soup usually made with tomato paste, chickpeas, and olive oil. It can be made vegan using vegan tinned chickpeas.
Tuscan White Bean Cassoulet – a vegetarian recipe that combines roasted vegetables, white beans, tomatoes and herbs with a tasty garlic and thyme white wine sauce.
Food (Photo by from Pexels)
Is Mauritius a great location to travel to for food adventures?
You bet! Mauritius is a foodie’s paradise, with an array of dishes and flavours to explore. The island has a rich history, and it’s an ideal place for food lovers. Mauritius has a blend of Creole and Indian cultures, with each country having its unique cuisine. Mauritius is renowned for its seafood, which comes from the rich ocean, and it’s a great location for diving and exploring the coral reefs. One feature to Mauritius is

instruction: Why can I see the moon during the day?
output:
Why can I see the moon during the day? What causes sunrise and sunset?
What is the most likely time and day for an eclipse? Why?
What are the different types of eclipses and when are they expected to occur?
Solar and Lunar Eclipses
Called a Total Solar Eclipse, a lunar eclipse called a Penumbral Lunar Eclipse, a part of a series of Lunar Phases such as New Moon, First Quarter Moon or Full Moon and a Solar Eclipse.
What is a lunar eclipse?
It is when the Moon is between the Earth and the Sun, and is visible to observers on Earth as a gradual dimming of its daylight-washed face. As the Earth's shadow moves across the Moon, the Moon's color becomes darker and muddy, resembling a bruise. The Moon's disk, or surface, will appear red and orange, which is due to scattering of sunlight reflected off Earth's atmosphere. The length of the eclipse depends on where is viewed from on Earth. It can last anywhere from an hour to a couple of hours, and may be partially visible to observers on Earth in partial, penumbral, or even annular forms.
How often a lunar eclipse occurs?
It occurs about once a year.
What type of eclipses are there?
Both Solar (from the Latin word for Sun) and Lunar (from the Latin word for Moon) Eclipses occur, but only the Moon passes through the Earths shadow. They are called Solar Eclipses and Lunar Eclipses, respectively.
A series of nine cycles takes place to create a full moon cycle:
In a Lunar Eclipse, where is the moon seen from?
The Moon always faces the Earth, but to an observer on the Earth from where the shadow of the Earth is not cast on the Moon's orbit, the Moon is always visible (as seen in the Earth's sky).
While the Moon's orbit sometimes puts it in the shadow's path, and sometimes sends it out, lunar eclipses always occur after the Moon completes its orbit around Earth. The Earth's shadow on the Moon is always shown in the moon's orbit, and when this shadow strikes the Earth at the right time, a lunar eclipse occurs.
In a Solar Eclipse, where is the Sun seen from?
The Sun is only visible in a solar eclipse when the Moon passes between it and the Earth, blocking out the light from the Sun. In a solar eclipse, the Moon's orbit is not the primary cause of the eclipse.
What causes an eclipse?
Eclipses occur because of a series of perfect symmetries - the Earth, Sun, and Moon have exactly the right distance, size, and distance from each other for Earth to create an effective and visible blocking of light between either the Sun or the Moon. Eclipses can happen two ways (both of which depend on a combination of the size of the Moon and distance of the Earth), either as a Solar Eclipse or a Lunar Eclipse. The exact symmetry that enables the light to pass or not pass is not visible to the human eye.
What happens during an eclipse?
An eclipse does not cause any noticeable physical changes to either the Earth or the Moon. The Earth's shadow is not really a shadow - it's the Earth's atmosphere that bends, deflects and blocks the sunlight, creating an area around Earth's shadow where the light has been blocked. And during partial solar or lunar eclipses, the Sun or the Moon, respectively, look very big, and may be clearly visible around the edges of the Earth's shadow.
What are the causes of an eclipse?
The gravitational force of the Moon on the Earth causes the Earth to slightly alter its orientation in space; the Sun's position in relation to the Earth also shifts slightly during its orbit every year. Astronomers say the Sun's position and the Earth's position cause the Moon to appear about 1.5 degrees behind the Sun at the time and location of an eclipse.
The Earth, Moon and Sun are all round; they move, spin, and orbit each other in relation to the stars. The Earth's axis and the Moon's orbit are not perfectly aligned. The Moon's orbit is inclined 5.1 degrees relative to the Earth's orbit around the sun, with 27.32 degrees being a direct line between the Earth and the Sun. This is called the plane of the ecliptic.
A Lunar Eclipse can last from 1-6 hours depending upon where it is observed from on the Earth.
Sunrise and Sunset Times
Sunrise and sunset occur at different times throughout the year due to the Earth's position around the sun. The closer an observer is to the equator, the more accurate the times of sunrise and sunset will be.
The Sun's

instruction: How do I take care of a wooden table?
output:
How do I take care of a wooden table?
To make sure that your wood table is cared for properly, it's best to:
Clean and wipe the table down when needed.
Avoid exposing it to direct sunlight and heat.
Apply a finish occasionally to maintain the original appearance & texture.
Let furniture restorer or professional woodworker handle it as needed.
How much does it cost to polish a wooden table by a professional?
Polishing a wooden table usually costs between $25 per hour and $100 and above per hour, depending on the table's size and the intricacy of the job.
To get more accurate pricing or to choose a professional wood polisher, contact furniture restoration companies, local woodworkers and furniture stores.
Read more about refinishing a wooden table here.
What are some tips for maintaining a wooden table's appearance?
To maintain the appearance of your wooden table, follow these tips:
Apply a wax or polish periodically to protect the wood's shine, preventing scratches and protecting it from dryness and water.
Wash hands and wear protective gloves, avoiding contact with water, and not letting liquids sit on the surface for too long as it may cause damage.
Keep the surface free of stains, scuffs or fingerprints, and wipe them away promptly using a soft cloth.
Avoid exposing the table to extreme temperature changes and high humidity.
Use a cloth to clean it regularly--don't use a brush to remove dirt or grime, as it may abras the finish.
Keep it away from direct sunlight exposure.
Use a soft pillow or fabric to protect the legs during heavy use.
Keep it clean and free of dust and dirt, and store it in a closet or an area with low humidity.
Read more about cleaning a wooden table here.
Are there any accessories that I can use to enhance a wooden table's appearance?
Yes, here are some accessories that can enhance a wooden table's appearance:
Tablecloths - they can add a decorative touch to a solid wooden table.
Tablescaps - these can elevate the table's overall look.
Tablescapes - they can give a table a cohesive look.
Table runners - they can add colour and style to a table's centerpiece.
Accent pieces- including mirrors, frames, candles, vases, and trinkets, can add character and charm.
To sum it up, there's no denying that wooden tables come with advantages. They're strong, durable and versatile. However, they also need a little love and attention.
When you take care of your wooden table, it will always look good, maintain its quality, and endure as a functional, long-lasting piece of furniture.

instruction: What year was the Yamato Battleship built?
output:
What year was the Yamato Battleship built?
The Yamato class battleships were built for the Imperial Japanese Navy during World War II, and were the largest battleships ever constructed. The Yamato was built in 1940, whereas its sister ship, Musha, was brought down by a British submarine just a year later. Of the two ships, only the Yamato ever saw combat.
What did the Yamato class battleship represent to Japan?
Yamato and Musashi represented Japanese nationalism and militarism during their construction. Despite the fact that the war was raging, Japan continued with the Yamato project. At the announcement of the completion of the Yamato class, then-Prime Minister of Japan Hiranuma Kiichiro compared it to a Japanese emperor.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K4mR3_XBx1Q
What does Yamato represent?
Yamato (å¤©ç«‹) is a brand owned by Sony Music Entertainment. Its name is taken from the 1975 anime television series with the same name. The meaning of the word was taken from the 1949 book The Rising Sun by Hugh Collier, where the word "yamato" was used to describe the culture and values of Japan.
Where is Yamato at?
At the end of 133 episodes, Yamato is discovered in the planet's past by the space pilots Megaroman, Dokuro, and Yukino. It is revealed that Yamato is actually a space vessel built by the people of the past, in an attempt to change the future and prevent the destruction of the planet Earth, which had been caused by the time period.
Why did Yamato destroy Earth?
The film begins by introducing the human crew of the Yamato (a space ship also referred to as the "Space Battleship Yamato") that are trying to save the planet Earth from total destruction. Earth has been blasted by an explosion of unknown origin, causing it to crumble into dust. Yamato and its crew are sent back in time to 2271 AD, where the survivors of this explosion try to prevent it from ever occurring.
How long does it take for Yamato to reach the final battle?
The first run of the English dub lasts about 99 minutes when the 40 minutes of credits are removed, which would equate to roughly 1-2 episodes. The full episode run lasts about four hours altogether. Yamato reaches its last battle with Zardock three months after it departed from Earth, on December 21.
Why is Yamato called a battleship?
The Japanese Navy used the term "battleship" to describe the Yamato-class as well as the earlier Kongo-class ships, so the U.S. Navy used "battleship" when describing these ships in English and when referring to them in its literature. In Japanese, it is commonly referred to as "yama tetsu."
Do humans survive in Yamato?
In the 1974 series, the crew are all killed by the monster before they can set off the device to destroy Earth in the 1977 film, only the computer's "Maddox" unit and the "Zardock" are left. In the end, both the past and present Yamatos are destroyed by the Garmillas invasion force, preventing the destruction of Earth.
Where did the Yamato battleship go?
The Yamato was built in Yokosuka, Japan at the Kure Naval Arsenal, and was the most powerful battleship ever built by the Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN). It was launched in 1941, and by the time of its commissioning, it had a crew of nearly 2,500 men.
Why was the Yamato named Yamato?
The name of the ship was chosen after Yamato (å¤©ç«‹))â€‹, a word that means "celestial or heavenly," and that symbolized the cultural values embodied in the ship. Yamato (å¤©ç«‹) became the cultural emblem of Imperial Japan. â€‹The name of the battleship was meant to honor the Japanese people, while also conveying the importance of the vesselâ€™s mission of protecting Japan.
Why did Yamato have to be sunk?

instruction: Please tell me about the romantic relationship between Julius Caesar and Cleopatra.
output:
Please tell me about the romantic relationship between Julius Caesar and Cleopatra.
Julius Caesar and Cleopatra were both famous Roman leaders who lived in the same era. Although it’s unlikely that they actually met, they are often depicted in fiction or historical drama as having a romantic relationship. Caesar was married to Pompeia, but he is believed to have had a sexual relationship with other women as well, perhaps including Cleopatra. Cleopatra is generally believed to have been a mistress of Julius Caesar or at least have a close relationship with him, based on some written sources, although there’s no evidence that they had any children together.

output:
what are some good ways to spread ashes?
how to spread ashes on land
How do you know which way to throw ashes?
You put a handful of ashes into the wind, and it naturally takes them where all around is open space. It's an excellent and satisfying way to lay to rest your loved one's remains.
It is often simpler and less expensive to choose open land than to rent a private, designated area, but it depends on their preference. You could also choose a private cemetery or land that is currently available or ask for permission from the landowner or government organization. On the other hand, spreading ashes on a sandy beach, in a place with a beautiful landscape or nature is ideal for a traditional burial, or spreading them on a grave or memorial site. Also, it could be a peaceful space, or maybe the ashes of the loved ones could inspire family and friends.
Where not to spread ashes?
It would not be appropriate on public property, streets or roads, or in areas used for religious rituals or ceremonies. The places should be far from schools, public transportation, parks, playgrounds, or places where children or people with respiratory problems could be present, such as open or unused fields, the beach, or other natural or public places.
How big should the spread be?
The spread should be large enough to catch most of the ashes, but not so large that it becomes too large. How large or small the burial depends on the preference of the deceased person along with the location of their burial site.
Is there a ritual with spreading ashes or is it all the same?
The spread should be the same, but in essence, every situation is distinctive. There is no right and wrong in spreading ashes as a ceremony for the departed, what should be done is chosen to help one feel that they are making the right choice or taking the right action as long as honoring their loved one with respect, love, and humility.
What should you say
A prayer, a blessing, a heartfelt remark, a heartfelt thank you to the deceased family member or friend. This helps bring light and positivity to the situation. As an example, it would be perfect to use a phrase to spread the ashes.
How do you throw ashes?
The best way to release ashes is out into the wind with the assistance of family or friends. Once the wind blows away part of the ashes, put on paper bags or bowls to cover the ashes, and throw the bag or bowl away.
It is acceptable to scatter the ashes into open space since it is natural, but be aware since this method is not recommended for public places or where children and strangers are present.
Who can do the spreading of ashes?
Generally, the spreading should be done by family or close relatives. However, it might be okay to do it by someone else, but this depends on the deceased person, their family, or preferences. This person could be a trusted friend, a relative, or the local funeral director, however, to avoid controversies, or to ensure that the ashes do not end up in the wrong hand.
Remember that the spreading of ashes should be handled delicately and respectfully. To ensure that what you do is appropriate to a grieving person, a funeral director or religious leader can usually advise you to do all the right things.
How do you spread ashes at the beach?
It's a fantastic choice to spread the ashes at the beach, or anywhere else on open land. Where to spread ashes at the beach?
Most of the public beaches have designated areas set aside for the disposal of the ashes. However, not all public beaches have their designated areas, they require a permit to use this area, which should be obtained before taking the ashes to the beach. If you are using a private beach, permission should be obtained from the property owners.
Where not to spread ashes at the beach?
You should avoid spreading them on the sand directly in front of people, and the place should be far away from lifeguards and people on the beach. Where the presence of people increases, the spreading is not recommended.
Select a sunny day where waves aren't too intense or where a breeze blows.
Go to the designated area that’s far away from the crowd, life guard stations, or parking lanes. This will ensure the ashes aren't washed by waves.
Dig a small hole and put the ashes in the hole using a bag or bowl. Cover the ashes with sand and spread it around, ensuring that the ashes are spread all around that area.

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Ukrainian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Okroshka?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Ukrainian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Okroshka? What  ingredients should be used? --Harsha (talk) 07:45, 1 July 2014 (UTC)
Okroshka (Russian: Окрошка, Ukrainian: Окрошка, "cabbage soup") is a Russian cold soup typically made with minced raw or lightly-cooked beef, mushrooms, onions, cabbage, and sometimes, vinegar. It may be decorated with sour cream or mayonnaise, served with dill or horseradish sauce.
You can also use eggs, meatballs, cottage cheese, fish or shrimp.
You can find all ingredients in any grocery store. You can also use fresh dill instead of dried dill. You can also leave out the vinegar for a more "traditional" taste, or use some other type of vinegar instead.
You can make it at home or buy it already made from a food store. The soup is also made in Central Europe and Central Asia (e.g., Kyrgyzstan, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan). [3]
You can serve it with either sour cream or mayonnaise, or a mixture of the two as a garnish. A spoonful of vodka added to the soup makes it a bit more alcoholic. You can also mix a little dill or horseradish sauce for the garnish, and you can add dill or parsley to the top of the soup to make for a more visual appeal. Just put everything in a bowl and mix it up well. Try it if you have the chance to try it out. --Ekran (talk) 08:43, 1 July 2014 (UTC)
I understand Okroshka is a very important dish in Russian cuisine; do you have another special recipe that is a must try in Ukrainian cuisine? --Harsha (talk) 14:21, 1 July 2014 (UTC)
Yes, I'm a passionate cuisine enthusiast. Here are a few popular Ukrainian dishes to try: Porridge with apple filling, called Plyaski; Borsch, a traditional Ukrainian soup; Varenyky, or stuffed dumplings, usually filled with potatoes or cheese; Paska, a sweet bread that is popular in Ukraine; Pirozhki, an important dish in Ukrainian cuisine; Dovzanzhky, a sweet bread topped with poppy seeds. Ukrainian cuisine is diverse in taste and in ingredients, so you can really explore the rich culinary heritage of the nation and its people. Check out Ukraine's official website for recipes and cooking tips, and you can find the recipes listed on the site here. --Ekran (talk) 14:46, 1 July 2014 (UTC)
Would you say that there are any traditional Ukrainian dishes that you could mention? --Harsha (talk) 15:11, 1 July 2014 (UTC)
The list above is more comprehensive than a small remark could do... So here are some of the most famous dishes, and I hope you can try out their recipes if you're lucky enough to visit Ukraine:
Baklava (Ukrainian: Баклава; Ukrainian: баклава; Russian: Баклава) is a dessert dish originally from the Middle East with a sweet, nutty filling, served chilled or at room temperature.
Ukrainian pirozhki are baked and sometimes called pampushki (Ukrainian: панпушки). They are a type of stuffed doughnut, usually prepared in vegetable or meat fillings, such as cabbage, mushrooms, or meat.
Borscht (also known as borshch; Ukrainian: божцій, Russian: борщ) is a traditional soup made of beets, potatoes, carrots, and possibly meat or fish. The soup is red thanks to the beets.
Galani (Ukrainian: Галани; Russian: Галани) are small pancakes often served with jam, cheese, or sour cream.
Varenyky (Ukrainian: варенки; Russian: вареньки), is a traditional Ukrainian pastry made from mashed potatoes stuffed with meat, cheese, or nuts. They are served hot.
Paska (Ukrainian: Паска; Russian: паска; Polish: paczki) is a sweet bread that has a variety of fillings like poppy seeds, jam, or ra

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Danish dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Koldskål?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Danish dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Koldskål? As you can see, I don’t speak Danish, so please provide simple instruction so I can try making Koldskål:
Thanks, Janette
– Janette S
Dear Janette, you’re welcome! The story of Koldskål is unique, dating some hundreds of years ago. And the recipe you’ve heard here is a simplified one so that it fits your preferences, and I like to share it with you:
• 300 grams (11 oz) of strawberries, washed and peeled
• 300 grams (11 oz) of blackcurrants, washed and stalks removed
• 300 grams (11 oz) of raspberries, washed and drained
• 800 grams (1.8 lbs) of cream
• 1 spoon vanilla
• 3 spoons of sugar
• 2 spoons of cinnamon
Make a bowl of ice cream and put it all together in a jug, mix and chill until cold. It’s fantastic!
It’s simple but delicious. Happy eating!
— Marietta C.
Could you tell me what’s the story behind Sticky Toffee Pudding?
– Lili R
Dear Lili, Sticky Toffee Pudding is an English food that’s popular for its taste and history. Originally, it’s a popular dessert in England, that was invented in the 1940s by a German woman called Rosemary Hume who was a housewife and a pioneer of baking.
At the kitchen of Hume and her partner, she was experimenting with a simple recipe of sponge with a toffee custard. Surprisingly, the dessert caught a buzz, and it made a big hit among customers. Thus, Sticky Toffee Pudding was born.
If you’re looking for a version of the cake that’s simpler to whip up without a lot of fuss, see a version of it by the chefs’ below:
Ingredients & recipe:
150g Butter
90g Sucrose
120g Unsalted Butter
120g Light Muscovado Sugar
2 tbsp Plain Yoghurt
For the sponge, preheat the oven to 180°C/350°F/gas 4. Pour the 450ml of water into a large saucepan, and bring it to the boil. Meanwhile, cream the butter and sugar together in a mixing bowl with a hand whisk until light and fluffy.
Slowly combine your eggs with the creamed mixture then add the vanilla extract and beat well.
Sieve in the flour and baking powder while slowly incorporating your mixture.
With the help of a ladle, add the hot water into the sponge mixture slowly to avoid curdling the mixture.
Pour the sponge mixture into a lined rectangular tin, which has been greased and lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the sponge is golden and a skewer inserted comes out clean.
While the sponge is baking, prepare your toffee sauce by melting the unsalted butter and muscovado sugar (in a pan) until the butter has melted.
Meanwhile, whisk the yoghurt until light and fluffy and cool the mixture down.
While the toffee sauce mixture is still hot, pour it into a bowl.
After the sponge has cooled down, transfer it to the toffee sauce and gently mix the sponge and the sauce.
Drizzle the remaining caramel sauce over the sponge and place in the fridge to set it.
Now you have a delicious Sticky Toffee Pudding – and it’s very popular in England!
– Karoline R.
Could you explain, if you have a chance, why the British have a reputation for being so fond of tea, and is there a particular type that you prefer/is the best in the UK?
– Alon M G
– You’re welcome! Tea is the fourth most popular drink in the world, and it’s also an important tradition in the society in England. There is no specific tea that’s the best in the UK. However, the most popular are green tea, black tea and herbal tea.

instruction: Please tell me the history of Walt Disney.
output:
Please tell me the history of Walt Disney.
Here is a brief history of Walt Disney;
An American animated film and television producer, actor, screenwriter and entrepreneur was born on December 5, 1901, in Chicago, Illinois.
His father was an alderman and real estate salesman, and his mother was a secretary. When he was eleven years old, Walt’s family moved to Kansas City.
While growing up, he tried many creative endeavors, like painting on cardboard, puppets, and writing stories.
During his high school years, he played an important role in establishing a theater company which helped him to establish himself as a young talented person.
In 1920, he started a drawing and advertising business, but the business didn’t reach its expectations, and Walt’s debts almost led him to being bankrupt.
While running his drawing and advertisement business, Walt’s mother passed away because of breast cancer.
Later on, he decided to come back home to Kansas City and start his new adventure by creating cartoons for his brother Roy, an actor and filmmaker.
After returning to Kansas City, he moved to Hollywood, and he found his new friends, such as Ub Iwerks, Earl Hurd, and Walt had developed a new technique called the multiplane camera. This technique allowed him to create depth in the backgrounds by using multiple planes.
In 1925, they established an animation studio called the Marvelous Cartoon Co. and began producing films. Later on, in 1927, they took part in the creation of the famous animated film “Steamboat Willie,” which changed Disney’s career, and he got his first real success.
Around the same time, the name changed to the Walt Disney Studio, and his animation studio developed more advanced and sophisticated tools like color animation, live-action, animation, and other techniques that allowed him to create the first animated feature film “Disney’s Snow White And the Seven Dwarfs.”
His second feature-length film was the famous “Fantasia” (1940), which consisted of a mix of classical music and animation.
During World War II, Disney worked on several films, like “Saludos Amigos,” and “The Three Caballeros” to support American soldiers in Latin America.
The Walt Disney Studio continued to create films and television shows, such as “Zorro” and “Dumbo” that turned Disney into one of the main film studios in the world.
The Studio was the first to introduce 3D animation to film production, and many animated films were produced during the 60s.
Meanwhile, he also established a theme park called the Disneyland, which became one of the most significant tourist attractions in the world.
Disney had a strong interest in building a better world, so he made donations to the American Red Cross, The American Heart Association, and UNICEF.
Disney died in Burbank, California, in 1966, at the age of 65 years, and he left a great legacy behind him, which continues to be known by many people.
Walt Disney was one of the most influential and famous figures in entertainment, and his films and inventions brought joy to millions of people.
His passion, hard work, and creativity changed the way people look at animation, and his impact on the film industry is still noticeable today.

instruction: How did serial killers get away with murder for so long in the 70s and 80s?
output:
How did serial killers get away with murder for so long in the 70s and 80s?
The 70s and 80s were a time that seemed to be plagued by serial killers, as the media portrayed them frequently in their coverage of crime. Throughout the media, and especially television shows and movies, serial killers became popularized. At first, they seemed to be some kind of new thing, as they weren't as common as they would become. However, why didn't the police, community and media of the day catch on?
The first answer is that many cases weren't brought to their attention, and were simply swept under the rug. It's quite common for serial killers to kill repeatedly in a short time frame. They will keep to a pattern, but they aren't caught until they've gone through a series of victims. It's far easier to catch a killer than it is to cover up a bunch of crime. Unfortunately, many victims were buried, and the police simply chalked it up to a random murder.
Additionally, many serial killers were known to have a background of abuse and trauma. They were often treated like they did nothing wrong, and were given chances to go on as they had previously. This kind of leniency led to killers going on to create a large body count, and it made it much hard to catch them. Law enforcement agencies took too long to act on leads, and were hesitant to put any cases on the front page.
Finally, the media didn't take the crimes seriously. Serial killers, often from the start, were perceived as bizarre and interesting. The media would cover the murder cases, often depicting them as high profile mysteries to be solved, rather than real life tragedies. It led to many cases falling through the cracks, and not being given the time they deserved. It came to a point where the government, police and media all collaborated to keep a lid on these kinds of cases.
Why was the justice system failing in California during the 1980s?
Throughout the 1980s, the justice system was failing in California. Many crimes went unsolved, or were solved quickly due to a lack of evidence. It became apparent that many of these crimes, in particular murders, were being committed by serial killers. California was famous for serial killers, as it happened frequently throughout the area.
The justice system failed for the same reason the whole of the country did. Many cases were being swept under the rug, and a lack of coordination between the different agencies meant that many criminals, and in particular, serial killer cases were going uninvestigated. Many of these killers had long and bizarre histories, but were treated almost like normal offenders. California had a long list of serial killers during this time, such as the Hillside Strangler, Richard Ramirez, and many more.
It was during the 1980s that the FBI was finally able to uncover patterns and trends for serial killers, and to use that information to find the perpetrators. However, the California justice system was failing for other reasons, including a lack of communication and coordination between the different agencies. By the time these killers were brought to justice, many more victims had been killed, and the community had been traumatized. As a whole, this is one of the darker chapters in American crime history.
How did law enforcement catch Serial Killer the Green River Killer in 2001?
In 2001, law enforcement authorities finally caught one of the most notorious serial killers in history, the Green River Killer. Gary Ridgway was captured after over 40 years of murder by an informant. What set the police apart from the serial killers who had preceded him was a strong commitment to the case.
The police investigation into the Green River Killer began in 1982, when police were responding to a series of reports of dismembered bodies and mutilated corpses found along the Green River. Over the next twenty years, despite numerous tips and several arrests that were later dropped due to insufficient evidence, authorities were no closer to catching the murderer.
In 2001, a woman named Patricia Krenwinkel, who was currently serving a life sentence for her involvement in the Charles Manson murders, contacted the Seattle Police. She told them that she believed that she had seen Ridgway at a bar in Yakima. This gave the police a lead that they never expected to find.
The police followed up on Krenwinkel's tip, and identified Ridgway by matching him to photographs of suspects in serial murder cases. The task force set up to investigate Ridgway uncovered evidence that linked Ridgway to the crimes, and he was charged.
The police's commitment to the case was the key to the Green River Killer investigation. The task force that was set up to look into the killer was incredibly thorough, and

instruction: How do I make apple juice?
output:
How do I make apple juice?
Apple juice is a refreshing beverage that is easy to make at home. Here is a simple recipe for making apple juice:
1. Wash the apples.
2. Peel the apples.
3. Cut the apples in half and remove the core.
4. Put the apples in a juicer.
5. Run the juicer to extract the juice.
6. Strain the juice through a cheesecloth or a fine-mesh strainer.
7. Add sugar or honey to taste.

instruction: How can I make bubble solution?
output:
How can I make bubble solution?
Baking soda, vinegar, and salt are the three base ingredients to make bubble solution. You can use any type of baking soda- or vinegar-based solution as base for bubble solution. There is no fixed formula or measuring scale. Make a small cup or just a few ounces of the three-base solution, so you can see if it works for you before making a larger batch.
Bubble solutions are very simple, but they make learning about the basic principals of chemistry quite fun. Making the solutions for your students is a very educational and fun exercise as they are so simple, affordable and easy to make.
Making Bubble Solution | Elementary Science Lesson Plan
Lesson 1: Creating a Solution
Activity: Students will need to make a solution. You need baking soda, vinegar, and water. Mix 1/2 tablespoon of vinegar with 1 teaspoon of baking soda in 2 cups of water. The mixture should fizz and fizz while bubbling for 30 to 45 minutes.
Students will need to set out the equipment to make their bubble solution,
Students will need to set out a balloon, cotton balls, and water in a clean small container. You can use a kitchen towel or a hand towel to test for bubbles.
Have the students make the solution and watch as it fizzes and bubbles.
Lesson 2: Bubble Investigation
Activity: After they have made the bubble solution, students will investigate bubbles. They will test different variables including temperature, size of the bubble, the movement of the hand etc. to find out which variables cause the number of bubbles or the size of the bubble.
Activity: Students can test the effectiveness of adding salt and different chemicals to their bubble solution. Students will observe and make comments on the effects of different additives, as they experiment with the solutions.
Students can also experiment with adding bubbles of different sizes to find their effect, size, and duration.
Experimenting with the bubbles will be an eye-opening experience. It shows how simple changes can have an impact on a chemical reaction.
Bubble solution is a fun and inexpensive experiment that is both educational and fun. It teaches students about the chemical reaction between vinegar and baking soda (acid base reaction), which students can use as a base to understand other chemical reactions. The experiment can be modified according to the level of students so make it simple that the very basics of chemistry that we have observed today on a fun and entertaining way.
Cubes with holes puzzle pieces and a wooden board to place the pieces on would be also perfect for this experiment.
Bursting water balloons or even rubber balloons, balloons, cotton balls and a clean small container are essential tools.
Students will need to collect a small amount of the solution as they could not collect all the contents. To make it more enjoyable, make the solution in large containers, so it will not be necessary to collect the solution, and will be easier to find in case you need it again.
Making and testing bubble solution is a great way to teach chemistry and other scientific principles, as they observe and examine the chemical reaction occurring as well as observe the differences in the reaction’s outcome when different variables, such as salt or different bubble solution additives are added.

instruction: Can you tell me a very easy to way clean a showerhead?
output:
Can you tell me a very easy to way clean a showerhead?
Yes, you can clean a showerhead quite easily by soaking it in vinegar, lemon juice or even baking soda. Firstly, pour a capful of each of the above ingredients into the showerhead and then fill up with hot water. Once it is filled up, leave it to sit for a while. After about five or ten minutes, use a scrubber and gently remove any hardened build up from the sides and spray nozzles. Once you clean the showerhead, scrub it with a toothbrush using mild soap and water. Rinse thoroughly and let it air dry. For longer showers, or if you have a pre-cleaned showerhead that is still not clean, you can use some hair conditioner to help loosen up any grime. If you have got a hard build up of soap scum, it is best to soak it overnight after filling the shower with water. Mix a few drops of your preferred cleaner (Hair & Body cleanser), and add a small dish of warm water. Let it sit for a few hours or overnight, then drain the cleaner and rinse the showerhead. You can also soak your showerhead in a commercial cleaner like Lime and Algaecide. Once it’s completely drained out, rinse with warm water.
Can you clean a showerhead without any chemicals?
Yes, it’s definitely possible to clean a showerhead without chemicals. You can use a mixture of white vinegar and baking soda to clean your showerhead. Simply pour a capful of white vinegar and half a teaspoon of baking soda into the showerhead, then fill it with hot water. Let it sit for ten minutes or so, and then gently scrub the showerhead with a clean towel using your finger or a toothbrush. Finally, rinse the shower head with warm water and let it air dry off. You can try using a mixture of hot water and a diluted non-toxic natural solution like tea tree oils or lemon oil. You can also use distilled white vinegar or hydrogen peroxide if you don’t have access to these natural cleaning solutions.
How can you replace a showerhead?
You can replace a showerhead quite easily. First remove the drain plug, and then turn off the hot water and cold water supplies. Then unscrew the showerhead from the drain. Most showerheads screw on to the pipes by using two (mostly plastic) washers, which are removed (they just click in and out). After you remove the showerhead, you can clean the surface, and then slide them back in to the pipes. To attach a new showerhead, you can tighten the nuts with a small screwdriver or just your hand. To screw the showerhead securely into the pipes, push on it from the bottom, and when it feels tight, slowly tighten the nuts using a screwdriver. Sometimes, the showerhead bolts or bolts that hold the showerhead in can get loose, and you have to loosen them using a screw driver. Once you have installed the new showerhead, you then need to test the hot water and the cold water supplies and turn the water back on. As long as there’s no leak where the showerhead is connected, then you have successfully replaced your showerhead.
Can you clean a showerhead without turning off the hot water?
As showerhead cleaning requires hot water to dissolve the soap scum, you cannot clean a showerhead without turning down the hot water supply. However, you can use non-toxic cleaner and a scrub brush to clean your showerhead without hot water. Add a capful of your preferred cleaner like white vinegar or lemon juice into the showerhead, and then pour two full cups of cold water (or even hot or warm water). Once it’s filled up, let it sit for ten minutes or so, and then gently scrub the showerhead with a clean towel using your finger or a toothbrush. However, since your water supply can be turned off, the showerhead may collect hard water deposits, so it’s not recommended to clean it frequently. It’s advisable to clean it after cleaning your bath, where the cleaning solution will be in your bathtub and may leak in the shower, to avoid hard water deposits.
How much water saves do my showerheads use?
One showerhead that uses less than eight gallons of water per minute can claim the WaterSense label. But, if you are in a city like New York, which is served water by the most efficient water systems, then a showerhead that uses less than four gallons of water per minute is an achievement. On average, the average showerhead used to consume 2.4 gallons of water during its lifespan. That’s a lot of water that gets used, especially if you take your showers four to five times a day. Luckily, many showerheads offer water savings, reducing the amount of water used, saving

instruction: What are some toys I can buy my kids for imaginative play?
output:
What are some toys I can buy my kids for imaginative play?
There are lots of toys that kids love to play with that can help spur imaginative play. Here are some great options.
1. Dolls and toys that can come to life (my kids loved the baby doll when we got that at Christmas with some clothes that came with it).
Our daughter loved dolls since she started school. She still loves them, and she loves to play that they have "voices" and that the doll is a "person" who talks. She'll create characters with her dolls and play imaginary scenarios, but I would love to get her some toys that can come to life. We have a big family, so it is easy to keep our toys for the kids, and because all the boys are into sports, my daughter often has her own toys to play with. (My daughter has always preferred baby dolls with heads, but not always in this case. Her sisters all have dolls they prefer, too.)
2. Magic and illusion toys - like hooping sticks, playing cards, cards, and puzzles that give you the opportunity to make the image you want to go one way, or come out the other. These have been in the boys' interest for a while, as well.
These are fun to play with and don't take a lot of space to store. They can be used with many different scenarios, and they're great for creative play. My sons love to set up games and scenarios for the cards they're playing with, and I always marvel at their creative thinking.
3. Building blocks. These are always a great activity for creating and solving problems, and they offer limitless possibilities.
My kids love to build. My son loves to build with large blocks and Lego, which can have endless possibilities, from space ships, to castles, to race cars. My daughter seems to prefer to build more things, like cities or dollhouses that she can decorate and place the dolls in. Either way, they're great for imaginative play, even if they don't come with a story or imaginary scenario at first.
4. Dress-Up-type toys. The boys love to get into dress-up situations, like costumes or playing with makeup, and there are so many possibilities.
Not only can they take on different personalities and pretend to be different people, they can tell stories or create characters. My son has recently become obsessed with makeup and wants to create superheroes or princess/prince characters, with a specific look and costume (and sometimes even storylines or backstories).
5. Arts and crafts. This is an obvious one, but it can be used for all sorts of types of play.
Not only can arts and crafts help spark creative play with painting or coloring, but there are also many possibilities that are more "out-of-the-box." We have a friend who always makes her kids origami and gets them to teach her how to do it. She would love someone else who loves to do that and take inspiration from her kids!
Ultimately, what works for one kid may not work for another, or may work for one kid and not the other. Take your kids' interests into account, as well!
S. R. C. - Teacher, writer, and entrepreneur
