You've already laid the groundwork for this with your characters' first names, so now all we need to know is more about our characters. 
Once we have all this information, we'll need to put it in a story beat sheet. A beat sheet is a document where we jot down all our ideas, and organize them into scenes with story beats. Each of your story beats is a moment of the story, and the beats work together to create a cohesive story. Here's one, example beat sheet below:

The following is what your beat sheet will look like for a short film. Feel free to insert your characters and their specific names, families and friends.

BLOG #3 - THE EXPOSITION
Now that we have all the information we need to start building our story, we'll need to know what the exposition will look like. 
Exposition is your first scene of your story. It's where you tell the audience what exactly they're missing so far: WHO is the MC?WHAT is she missing? Where and when is she missing it, and what does it look like when she's missing it? Why is she missing it?
The purpose of the exposition is to grab the audience's attention, and set the stage for how the rest of the scene, and the movie, will play out by presenting the MC, and what's missing; the MC's problem. The exposition is a way to connect the audience with the characters, so that they can get emotionally invested in a scene, story, and ultimately in the film industry as a whole. 
Think of movie trailers. When watching the trailer, we're getting a snapshot of the film, and we're getting emotional in the process because we're interested in the characters, the story, and their problem. The exposition is the way we do that in the story itself.
With our beat sheet: 


*

*We know our character's first name, and the reason for her character arc.

*We know who her family member is, and what their role in the arc will be.

*We have a scene that shows her problem, and what she's missing (which becomes the "inciting event").


We don't necessarily have the whole story yet, just the first scene. So how do we write the exposition? Let's turn to some examples.
EXAMPLE 1: EXPOSITION A

The exposition in the following scene tells us:


*

*The hero's real name: Scott Peterson 

*His current job: construction worker. 

*What he's missing: A wife and family. 

*Why he's missing it: This is revealed as the story progresses. 

*Where he's missing it: At work. 

*When he's missing it: At his mother's funeral.    

In this case what he's missing is his wife, and why he's missing it is so that he can spend more time with his children (this is revealed in the rest of the story). Exposition B and C
I could have also written this exposition as either 'Scott Peterson's mom had just died, and at the funeral he realized that he had no wife and family,' or as 'Scott was a workaholic, when he went to a funeral to say goodbye to his mom, it brought him face to face with an event that changed his life. 
Now, how do we make that specific story a little more cinematic? Let's look at examples in films.
EXAMPLE 2: THE SCIENCE OF EXPOSITION
Many stories have a simple exposition. Here's an example:

"We're leaving in five minutes- be ready to go." This is the simple exposition. It tells us:


*

*The MC's name: John Smith

*What he's missing: Time with his family and friends. 

*The current situation: His car needs to leave in five minutes, and he has a meeting to go to.


Notice how simple yet captivating the exposition is, without needing any extra details.

instruction: I live in Scotland and would like to know the most cost effective way to heat my house considering the rise in both gas and electric prices. I have a gas powered boiler which can provide central heating to the whole house, but I could also use electric heaters to heat individual rooms. Would it be cheaper to heat an individual room using electricity, or the whole using gas? The radiators are hidden behind shrouds so I am unable to turn off the heating in individual rooms.
output:
I live in Scotland and would like to know the most cost effective way to heat my house considering the rise in both gas and electric prices. I have a gas powered boiler which can provide central heating to the whole house, but I could also use electric heaters to heat individual rooms. Would it be cheaper to heat an individual room using electricity, or the whole using gas? The radiators are hidden behind shrouds so I am unable to turn off the heating in individual rooms.
It would be cheaper to heat the individual rooms using electric heaters or a combined heat and power (CHP) system (if you can), but it depends on the cost of your electricity. Generally speaking, electricity is more expensive than gas (but not always; the cost of electricity is variable). You can use www.carbonfootprint.com to get prices for electricity and gas in your area.
To calculate what it will cost to heat your home with electricity, enter your average annual electricity use (watt-hours) and the cost of electricity (in pence per unit) on the Carbon Footprint website. I’d enter these costs as an estimate, but also mention at what times (days, hours, or times of year) you use the most electricity (such as after work, during heating peaks, or weekends) so the calculator can predict more accurately what cost will be.
That will give you roughly the cost per heating hour of heating your home just using electricity. There’s no way to know exactly how much each heating hour will cost you, as it depends partly on how you use the electricity.
You can also enter your annual gas usage and cost per unit into Carbon Footprint, and then calculate the cost of heating your home with gas. You can do this to give you a full understanding of where you spend the most money on heating.
In doing this, you can plan ahead and decide whether to use gas or electric heaters, or whether to install a CHP system. CHP systems are not ideal for all homes, but they are good for reducing carbon emissions and cutting costs.
You can also try to insulate your home better, and reduce the likelihood of energy waste due to inefficient heating.

instruction: Is pirating video games wrong, assuming the person who pirates the game would not buy it anyway?
output:
Is pirating video games wrong, assuming the person who pirates the game would not buy it anyway?
Does the same go for torrenting movies?
I feel like the wrong mentality is being shown here. The whole “If you pirate games, you’re no good” mentality has really skewed perception and it’s really messed up.
People are not talking about piracy in general they seem to have it out for GTA5.
I feel like this whole debate is much ado about nothing. I wouldn’t pay £50 for a game that’s going to be out later today on another platform, so I’ll wait a few months and buy it on sale as soon as it’s no longer “new”. However, is that because it’s cheap and I didn’t like the game? No. I liked the game a lot, but my brother bought it first, and I’d already played it. It didn’t matter that it was a bad game, because I didn’t want to play it twice anyway. I bought a copy of the game recently, and have been playing through it, because I’m going to use my brother as a reference point for gameplay, instead of getting burned out on it. In short, I don’t see how anyone’s views on piracy will change if it’s not really a question of morality or right or wrong in the first place.
GTA Online’s economy has actually been in decline in recent months.
http://imgur.com/a/4Y0J8
You’re right, pirating is bad business. I can remember the days when piracy was common, and it was always a joke how money would just disappear, with no financial repercussions to developers – it’s something that’s been changing in recent years, but unfortunately, not fast enough to prevent the industry from being the most pirated one in the world in many cases.
I’d like to think that not paying for a game is immoral and a waste of money, though – there are far more people willing to pirate games than there ever have been to buy them, and it’s not really fair that one person could pay $60 for a game, while someone else could buy the same version but for $0. In some cases, people who pirates games say they’ll buy them later – but that’s clearly not a reliable system. I think that’s something that needs to be more prominent in the discussion… as it stands, it’s just “what’s right and wrong in your opinion” all over again.
I’m not saying it’s not right for everyone – the whole point of this debate is for us to discuss our opinions, not to present them to everyone else and force them to agree. I just wish that the arguments would be more substantive – and more importantly, a little more focused.
Pirating, particularly of games, is a complex issue. It’s not just a matter of right or wrong, its more complicated than that. I don’t blame people for pirating my games, and I personally will not punish them. Instead I ask a few questions.
For example, why do you pirated your games, how do think it affects me financially, what can the devs do to change your opinion if your pirated my game and if they did to what would you still pirate the game?
If you ask people these questions then I think you can get a good idea of how to change behaviors.
We often forget one important thing too.
It is a universal truth that everyone has the right to their own opinion.
That is the point at which I have to draw the line – if I start telling someone that their opinion on a very complex, deeply personal and divisive matter is wrong, or that if they express that opinion it reflects negatively on them as a person or people in general, we’re heading into troll territory. The conversation can be had, sure, but I’m certainly not going to get involved in those arguments, as there’s a time and a place for those discussions – but it’s got nothing to do with this blog post.
“Why do you pirate your games”
Because there’s no reason to buy them. I could care less about the story-driven games like GTA, Assassin’s Creed or Fallout. I think the gameplay and features are more important than the story, and I’ve been able to find lots of games that I think offer the same amount or even more of fun then these popular titles. I feel that there’s nothing I’m missing by not spending 60 dollars on these games.
I really do not have the patience to sit through cutscenes or storylines just to play a game on a console or pc. It seems like they’re just trying to make their game more like a movie, yet

There are around 800,000 immigrants to the US every year, and around 70 percent are from Latin America. The most common countries of origin are Mexico, Mexico, Cuba, El Salvador, and Dominican Republic. Most immigrants arrive in the US with high hopes of building a better life and providing a better future for their families. Most immigrants to the United States must provide financial support for their family. . In contrast, most US citizens have a more conservative view on the number of people they can support than in the past. Some Americans in the United States do not like immigrants because they believe that they take their jobs, or that immigrants are criminals, or that they bring drugs into the country. In many parts of the United States, immigrants face discrimination and prejudice due to their race, religion, or country of origin. They experience discrimination and prejudice, and as a result, immigrants are more likely to experience depression and anxiety.
The immigration process and policies can be complex and intimidating. However, immigrants have a lot to offer. . Immigrants often have strong cultural backgrounds, knowledge of many languages, and strong family relationships, making them desirable workers in many fields. As well as being able to provide many skills for the United States, including nursing, construction, and other skills. Immigrants often bring their traditional values into their adopted country, offering their culture and community service to the state. As a result, immigrants are often regarded as an economic asset to their countries, and can contribute much to our society, as well as their own.
On December 21, 2015, President Barack Obama announced that all US citizens and permanent residents of the US will be allowed to apply for a 3 month extension to the already existing travel ban. Travel bans were first introduced in the US in 1850, banning free blacks from entering the states. The ban was used during the World War II, against Japanese and Germans, and in the early twentieth century. The travel ban was extended after the 9/11 terror attacks, and President Trump extended the ban to cover all nationalities for 60 days. The new travel ban will allow US citizens and permanent residents of the US to apply for a 3 month extension to the already existing travel ban. This new policy will apply to all nationalities, including Americans, Europeans, and Asians. The new travel ban will expire in March 2016, and if it is extended, it will be subject to the same rules and regulations as the original ban.
The US immigration system is complex, and it is difficult to predict how long it will take to obtain a visa. US immigration policies are subject to change, and visas are subject to change to meet the needs of the country. It is advisable to start the process early to avoid disappointment. It is important to provide accurate and up-to-date information when submitting paperwork, as the US is extremely strict with immigration laws. Applicants must fill out the appropriate forms and undergo a thorough background check, and as a result, it can take several months up to a year to obtain a visa. It is worthwhile to contact the US embassy or consulate in your country to ensure that you are on the right course and to answer any questions regarding your application.
The US is one of the most generous countries in the world in terms of immigration. There are several different types of visas available, including the H1B visa, which is issued for skilled employees in specialized fields. Other highly skilled professionals are allowed to enter into the US using the EB 1, EB 2, and EB 3 visas. Family members of US citizens, including children, spouses, and parents, who wish to enter the US, are allowed to enter using the visas H1B, H2B, and H4. instruction: How does metabolism work?
output:
How does metabolism work?
Food, oxygen, and water are needed for our bodies to work properly. All food and water enters our body through our mouths; however, much of our food does not get digested in our stomachs. This un-digested food travels through our small intestine and large intestine before being absorbed into our bloodstream.
The pancreas releases enzymes and hormones in our blood, which activate a mechanism that converts the stored energy in food in to usable energy, a process called cellular respiration. In other words, it converts food molecules into energy which is used by the body.
What is the purpose of metabolism?
Metabolism is a vital process that involves converting energy from food into usable energy and provides the body with the energy it needs to maintain normal cellular function, growth, and reproductive functions. It also enables growth and repair of body tissues.
In brief, the purpose of metabolism is to maintain health and proper tissue function. The body’s metabolism helps in maintaining the body’s temperature and also allows for the processing of hormones for proper functions, such as reproductive and emotional functions.
What are the main functions of the digestive system?
Food, oxygen, and water are all needed for our bodies to work properly. Our digestive system breaks down these foods, takes in oxygen and water and then allows the nutrients to travel to the body.
The role of the digestive system is to break down and process the food eaten in a way that the body can then use to fuel the body. This can all be broken down into three main groups.
Digestion includes all methods the body uses to break down these big molecules. In other words, the body uses enzymes to break down the food into smaller and smaller parts.
The primary function of the digestive system is to break down the food we eat and get the nutrients into our bloodstream.
After being processed, nutrients from a meal are transferred to the bloodstream and transported throughout the body through the blood. After entering the bloodstream, these nutrients are used for different functions.
The primary function of the liver is to filter the blood and remove toxins, but it also plays a vital role in metabolism, producing glucose and fats.
The kidneys regulate fluid balance, remove toxic waste products, and regulate blood pressure.
The lymphatic system is a network of vessels and tissues that collects and delivers fluid from the body’s tissues and returns it to the bloodstream. It’s primary function is to remove excess water from the tissues and eliminate toxins from the body.
The respiratory system moves air in and out of the body, allowing us to breathe in the required oxygen and remove carbon dioxide.
The skin and respiratory systems work together to eliminate pollutants from the air and water, by producing sweat that removes excess salt and saltwater.
The nervous system is in charge of movement and sends signals to keep organs functioning correctly.
The cardiovascular system helps to take oxygen and nutrients to the vital organs and transport waste products away from these organs.
To understand why metabolism is connected to your weight, it’s vital to understand what weight is and how it’s measured. By weight, they refer to the amount of mass that a body contains. While weight is often thought of as the only indicator of a healthy body, there are more important factors that shape a healthy body.
Health is not only derived from our weight but our function, overall well-being, and level of fitness that we are able to maintain.
Metabolism is the process by which our body converts our food intake into energy. That means that without metabolism, we would not be able to produce energy. That’s why metabolizing food is an essential aspect of a healthy lifestyle, and when your metabolism is slow, you may not be able to maintain your weight, and you might end up having a higher weight.
Therefore, metabolism is inextricably woven into the idea of weight. When metabolism increases, our body is better equipped to turn food into energy. Our body will use this energy over time, increasing our ability to burn calories, aiding in maintenance of a steady weight.
Furthermore, the role of metabolic rate in maintaining a healthy weight cannot be understated, since when metabolism is fast, your body converts the food into energy immediately, without storing excess fats or carbs, which leads to an increase in weight. With these factors in mind, you can see how metabolism, weight, and weight loss are interdependent.
Your health and the food intake you eat every day plays a significant role in the metabolism process. Additionally, various factors beyond food intake also influence the metabolism function.
Physical activity also works as an essential element that can increase fat loss, and it significantly boosts up the rate of metabolism.
Sleep: While it’s not as directly related to metabolism as other factors, a lack of proper sleep can significantly influence metabolism.
Hormone function: Hormones are necessary in regulating metabolism. It can alter hormone function, especially hormone

instruction: Explain the difference between sets and lists in Python.
output:
Explain the difference between sets and lists in Python.
Answer: A set is a collection of unique elements without any order and doesn't contain duplicates. Whereas a list is a collection of unordered, indexed elements and contains duplicates.
Question 6. Explain the difference between a dictionary and a set.
Answer: A set is a collection of unique elements without any order and contains no duplicates. Whereas a dictionary is a user-defined type data structure. It is a collection of key value pairs, and each key must be unique within the dictionary.
Question 7. Explain the difference between a list and a tuple.
Answer: A list is a collection of unordered, indexed, mutable elements, whereas a tuple is a collection of ordered, immutable elements that must be identical in size.
Question 8. Explain the difference between a list and a dictionary?
Answer: A list is a sequence where each element is a string or a number, unlike dictionaries where it is a mapping between keys and values. Whereas, a list is mutable and has a linear access.
Question 9. What is the difference between a list and a set?
Answer: A list is a collection of sequence elements, while a set is a collection of arbitrary objects unique and immutable objects. Whereas, a list is ordered, and has integer indices while a set has no order or indices.
Question 10. Explain the difference between a list and a dictionary.
Answer: A list is a collection of elements and is unordered, whereas a dictionary is a mapping of a key to its associated value. This mapping is unique, unlike lists, and can allow multiple values per key.

instruction: List the pieces of a reinforcement learning system that can learn how to play Atari games.
output:
List the pieces of a reinforcement learning system that can learn how to play Atari games. (hint: It's a lot)
As we’ve mentioned, reinforcement learning is a lot to learn, so it’s great to approach the topic via a learning curve. If you’re a beginner, the main challenge to overcome is developing an understanding of how these principles work together in the context of learning. Luckily, the below is a simple, step-by-step process of how every basic piece of a reinforcement learning system could work together in one cohesive framework!
We’ll start by building a reinforcement learning system from the ground up to demonstrate the entire process. Once you’ve got an understanding of the basic components, you can look to start building more complex learning systems from these building blocks!
Step 1: Build a Reinforcement Learning System
Here’s a basic overview of what should be included in an Atari game reinforcement learning environment:
Agent: The robot or agent
Game Board: The game environment
Actions: The choices for the agent (e.g. “move to the right” or “move up“)
State: The current state of the game or environment
Reward: How the game responds to each state
Drones - These are used to carry the cargo to different destinations. The drones must be moved from one place to another to transport the cargo in an efficient and timely manner.
Scheduler - This is the task of the drones to schedule their tasks optimally.
State Tracker - This is required to keep track of the state of all the drones during their activities on the platform.
Learning Module - This module is used to train the drones on new scenarios using reinforcement learning algorithms in the form of an AI agent.
Agent: In our Atari game reinforcement learning system, we have a player-programmed agent that represents a robot or an automated system. Our Agent needs to take actions to interact in the game environment.
Game Board: The game’s board or environment
Actions: The choices for the agent (e.g. “move to the right” or “move up“)
State: represents the current state of the game or environment
Reward: This is a value that indicates how the game or the environment responds to each state.
The reward system is a critical aspect of reinforcement learning. It’s a feedback system whereby the agent receives a reward or punishment for each action it takes. In Atari game reinforcement learning, the “reward” can be interpreted as in-game points; losing a level in Mario, for instance, is considered a negative reward. The agent’s goal is to achieve a high score, also known as the maximum reward.
The reinforcement learning model takes feedback from the environment as it goes through training, allowing the system to generate its own approach to the game’s scenario.
There are several reinforcement learning algorithms, in which our Atari game reinforcement learning system could use. These include the following:
Actor - Critic Models: In this, the agent is trained to map the state of the game with the corresponding outcome; that is, it observes the environment and takes decisions on how to go about actions.
Q learning: This aims at finding the best policy for the agent. By tracking multiple Q values that determine the agent’s expected future performance, this will help the agent with its decision-making process.
Policy Gradient: This refers to an update rule based on policy differentials that aims at maximizing the overall reward for the agent. The agent will take an action that follows the gradient of that policy.
Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL): In general, this encompasses both Q-learning’s concept and policy gradient learning. It incorporates a model that is trained in a supervised manner to represent the game as a deep neural network.
Step 2: Train the Agent
This involves training the agent on how to perform better or take better decisions by reinforcing its behavioral choices on each step. Our target is to get the agent to perform optimally in the game’s scenario.
At each turn of the Atari game scenario, the agent takes an action in the environment, gets a reward, and modifies its state of current decision. The state includes all the data points that the agent has gathered. This creates a state-action value function that the agent uses to determine the next best move.
Here’s a simple, step-by-step training process:
1. Create an initial state: The agent in our reinforcement learning algorithm must be provided with a starting state for the reinforcement learning. This can be a simple game board or an initial state of the game for the agent to navigate.
2. Provide the agent with instructions: We then tell the agent the rules of the game. This provides instructions for the agent.
3. Feed information: Each

instruction: Why can time seem to slow down in dangerous situations?
output:
Why can time seem to slow down in dangerous situations?
In certain dangerous situations, individuals often experience a temporary increase in their perceived sensory perception (sensory amplification) that causes time to seem to slow down, leading to a sense of fear and hypervigilance. In this case, sensory amplification occurs as a result of the amygdula and other areas of the brain, which increase the sensitivity of the senses of vision, hearing or touch, to be able to process information, thus allowing the individual to detect dangers more quickly than usual.
Anxiety and fear symptoms are caused by the overpowering anxiety or fear that an individual may feel before or during an event that triggers the fight-or-flight response. In case of an emergency, this response helps the body to react to stressful situations. However, under extreme conditions, an individual may experience symptoms associated with anxiety, such as fear, sweat, racing heart rate, and shortness of breath, among others. In extreme situations, a person can experience hypnagogia, which is a state that occurs during sleep at the onset of sleep.
It should however, be noted that some studies suggest that certain cognitive activities, such as counting or playing a musical instrument, lead to an increase in neurotransmitters for the experience of flow, making them particularly effective. With some meditation techniques, there have been reports of slowing down time. However, these reports have not been backed up by scientific evidence, and the actual cause of this phenomenon for such techniques remains unknown.
The sensation of time slowing down is a neurological phenomenon that is thought to be triggered by the brain perceiving danger. In extreme situations, a persons perception of time can slow down considerably, allowing them to process information and respond more quickly.

instruction: What type of Rifle is an AK47?
output:
What type of Rifle is an AK47?
The AK-47 (known as the Avtomat Kalashnikova or AK-47) is a select-fire, gas-operated assault rifle developed in the Soviet Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It features a gas-operated system, two-stage trigger, bullet-dropping lever, and a rotating bolt held in place by three lugs with a locking block.
What is better AK-47 or AR-15?
AK-47 vs AR-15 In terms of power levels, there’s really not much difference. The 7.62x39mm round from the AK-47 is actually more powerful than the 5.56mm NATO round from the AR-15, but the difference is actually negligible. However, the AK-47 does have a much greater range and capacity.
Are AK-47s legal in the US?
The AK-47, a rifle that was adopted by Russia and is still widely used throughout the world, remains legal to own in most states in the United States. The ATF considers the rifle to be classified as a NFA firearm and therefore it requires an FFL to legally transport within the U.S.
Is there a 10mm AK-47?
The 10mm AK-47 is a highly versatile weapon that is fully customizable to meet your unique needs. This rifle is equipped with a 10mm round-nose bullet, which can deliver a forceful blow to your target – perfect for home defense, hunting, and personal protection.
Can you own an AK-47?
What AR-15 rifles are legal in California:
Can you own an AK-47 in CA? Possession or transfer of an automatic weapon, such as the AK-47, is illegal in California. Many state regulations were triggered post-Las Vegas shooting when it became apparent that these kinds of weapons were not in compliance with state law.
What is AR-15 with magpul?
The AR-15 with Magpul PMAG: the PMAG50 is a 50-round magazine for the AR-15, and just 14 ounces. It is built to handle the rapid fire and heavy recoil of the high capacity rifle.
Do AR-15s work?
In terms of accuracy, a well-built AR-15 can be quite accurate. The AR-15 utilizes a bolt-action system, which allows you to put the barrel in a fixed position, and you can always add an adjustable stock or scope to the rifle for greater accuracy – and the option to shoot at long ranges.
What is difference between AR-15 and AK-47?
The AK-47’s gas system and magazine release are both ambidextrous, while the AR-15 is not. The AK-47 is not adjustable for sight height, while the AR-15 has rear and front sight settings.
Is the AK-47 powerful?
As we already stated, the AK-47 is not a powerful gun, but the M16/AR-15 was developed to use the same round as the AK-47’s, which means it has the same recoil. The 5.56mm NATO rounds fired from the M16/AR-15 have less stopping power and energy than the 7.62mm rounds fired from the AK-47, yet the 7.62mm rounds have a higher velocity, thus making it deadly.
Can you own an AK-47 in California?
A federal law is enacted in 1986 that makes it illegal to sell or manufacture “assault-style rifles.” Specifically, any semi-automatic rifle that has a grip, pistol grip, and magazine that can hold more than 10 rounds of a weapon that uses a .223 caliber or larger round is an “assault-style rifle.” The AR-15 qualifies.
Are AR-15 rifles legal in California?
California is just one of several states that have banned certain types of semi-automatic guns, even if they were not designed for military use. In some cases, bans may also be triggered depending on the type of firearm used to transport the firearm.
Is it easier to own an AK-47 or AR-15?
If the AK-47 is more durable and better for military use, the AR-15 probably has the advantage when it comes to user-friendliness and ease of maintenance.
How many rounds can an AK-47 hold?
In an AK-47, the standard magazine holds 30 rounds of 7.62 x 3

instruction: why the sky is blue?
output:
why the sky is blue?"
If people understand something and don't have a better explanation about why it is true, they should accept that science does not always have a definitive, completely explanatory answer immediately available, and that even "best theories" may be subject to changes in the future.
There are ways we can be scientific while still appreciating and affirming God as the greatest and ultimate truth of life. It is possible to be scientific and know what is, but at the same time have some awareness of what we cannot explain, namely, something that goes beyond explanation or explanation based on empirical study alone, such as the Christian belief that "God became flesh and dwelt among us."
This doesn't mean such beliefs are a violation of empirical science, but it does mean that these insights should not replace our sense of science as a powerful, rational, and empirical tool.
Dr. Greg Koukl, a spokesman on religious freedom and an author/teacher, has stated "I'm a Christian, a biblical Christian. And biblical Christianity teaches that we're born to be loved, but if we're born to be loved, then we must have a lover. Well, if I want to know the truth, I better go to the one who makes truth."
Dr. Koukl is a well-know apologist.
Why is Science Good, if it says that Life came from Matter (The Big Bang) or that Life and the World came from Chaos?
Scientists like to reduce things to their constituent parts, their smallest particles, and to say that everything starts with the Big Bang, that all the matter and atoms that make up life came from that huge bang of energy, that the ultimate goal of natural evolution is to produce life. But the theory of evolution or the origin of the universe explain nothing.
In fact, modern science is a bit of a contradiction. In some fields like the quantum physics, in which nothing can be explained because we only have theories about it, but never come to a conclusion to explain what the physical universe is made of, there is more a sense if "knowing something and not knowing it" than being able to explain in complete and full terms what the origins of the cosmos or the evolution of living things are. In other fields such as biology, we are able to study and categorize life and the workings of living systems, to some degree at least, even though we may not know the ultimate purpose of living systems or the origins of life.
To make an analogy, a theory or theory of everything that would explain everything about the physical world are comparable to the "One Ring to rule them all." These theories would not only explain everything about the world we perceive today, but everything, including our own existence. However, there is no such theory or theory of everything right now. In fact, the question "what is the origin of the physical world and life" is unanswered, although there are theories, and scientists continue to look for an answer.
For Christians, it is not important to look for a definite and definitive answer to the questions "How did the universe, the physical world, and life come to be?" and "What is the ultimate purpose?" because we believe that God gave an account of the beginning of the world, which shows that He was at work before the beginning, and that everything is possible with Him, and can be explained, including how God created everything from nothing.
Christians often say, "If naturalistic evolution and a big bang happened then maybe we have a God who does the same thing and who is worthy of adoration and worship... But if naturalistic evolution happened and no God was behind it, then God would seem limited, if there really is no God."
A scientist once said that "evolution is a theory that is being tested. It hasn't yet been refuted."
But that is not justifiable. Every scientific theory we learn, is put to the test, and then discarded or adjusted to better explain and describe reality. The fact that evolution has not been "refuted" is not a good reason to still hold that theory as the final answer. Many scientific theories have been refuted, and there are new theories that seem to replace old ones, or that explain better how things work in nature.
In short, the question "What is the ultimate origin and purpose of life in the universe?" and, therefore, the question about "How did our world come to be?" cannot be answered by science alone, and science cannot answer it without a better understanding of transcendent meaning, and a knowledge of God as the source of life and transcendent meaning.

instruction: Should I use the boiling water method or Ammonia fermentation to make dye out of mixed Hypogymnia lichen?
output:
Should I use the boiling water method or Ammonia fermentation to make dye out of mixed Hypogymnia lichen? Which one is more effective?
Hi, You have to use both methods with the boiling water method being the primary method. The ammonia fermentation method is a second step that helps to intensify the hues of the colors, but the primary method is boiling the lichen in water and then let it cool down, then add some ammonia and mix again, and in the end the dye is ready. There’s no need to panic. This lightsaber is simply a decoration. You know, like a candle? Or the Star Wars Party Invitation.

These items come in a variety of styles, colors, and designs to make sure your Jedi Party is truly Jedi-worthy.

List pros and cons of lowering the capabilities of my ears by listening to loud music (70-75db) in order to withstand the incredibly loud sound of screaming kids at school.
output:
List pros and cons of lowering the capabilities of my ears by listening to loud music (70-75db) in order to withstand the incredibly loud sound of screaming kids at school.
For me, it's 115dB for even a few seconds, without earplugs or good shielding. At 110dB or less for ten minutes or more, it's just beginning to hurt, but with more time things get better as they become numb, then it's not as bad. At 120-something dB with earplugs, I feel a sense of dread because hearing is very critical to my work and it can damage my hearing permanently, though it's not immediate as the hearing loss from loud music would be permanent also if it's continuous. It's not pleasant, but I don't want to risk losing hearing if I don't have to.
So, I'd keep it under 120dB (my own limit) with earplugs, or not at all.

instruction: what is the Infinite banking concept?
output:
what is the Infinite banking concept?
Infinite banking, also known as a compound system or interest-free banking, is an old system whereby cash deposited into an account can increase, through investment and simple interest. This means that the owner is able to accumulate wealth without borrowing and lending money.
How does infinite banking work in practical terms?
Infinite banking works by using cash to increase cash at a low cost of return. In many instances, customers may begin by depositing a few dollars in the Infinite Banking account to start. After this amount is deposited, it will compound into interest-free accounts over the years.
Do you still make interest with Infinite banking?
Infinite banking is a system where there is no interest charged to the accounts; in fact, there’s no way of earning interest. Instead, the accounts are supposed to compound interest using the principal amount deposited into them until the time comes to cash them out.
What is the idea behind infinite banking?
Like compound interest, finite banking is all about how savings build upon themselves over time. The more a person sets aside, the more he or she earns. The key difference is that the infinite banking account has no interest, so the money the account holder has invested will keep growing without having to be added to periodically.
How long did it take for a dollar to double at 10%?
The mathematical calculation that shows the interest gained by a bank account with a nominal rate of interest of 10% per annum is as follows: Interest on $1 for every year is 0.1 (10%), thus $1.10 after a year. A doubling of the value of the account is the result of compounding the accrued interest over a period of time.
What is the math behind compound interest?
Calculating the amount of interest: The formula for calculating interest is as follows: Interest = [Principal] × [interest rate per year] × [years] — [Principal] In this formula: a = interest rate per year. b = years Interest is represented as the percent interest that will be paid in the following way: P = principal or the investment amount. t = year over year.
Is there is an infinite banking company?

instruction: What are some Nietzsche's philosophical ideas that still influence modern-day culture?
output:
What are some Nietzsche's philosophical ideas that still influence modern-day culture?
Nietzsche's ideas on human nature, truth and knowledge and morality are still influential in modern-day culture. Nietzsche regarded human beings as inherently powerful, independent and creative and believed that they can overcome the limitations of societal norms and conventions. He challenged the idea of objective knowledge and believed that truth is relative and subject to individual interpretation. He also believed that morality is subjective and is dictated by the values and beliefs of a society or individual.
What are some examples of Nietzsche's ideas and how they have influenced modern-day culture?
Nietzsche's ideas on human nature, the nature of truth and the notion of morality have influenced modern-day culture in several ways. Some examples of his ideas and their influence include:
1. Human Nature
In his philosophy, Nietzsche rejected the idea of an objective and universal human nature. Instead, he believed that individual human beings are unique and that human nature is malleable. This idea has influenced contemporary debates on human rights, identity politics and the role of social media in shaping the identities of individuals.
2. Truth
Nietzsche believed that truth is relative and subjective. This idea challenges the idea of an objective and universal truth and has contributed to more critical and questioning attitudes towards accepted truths and beliefs in modern-day society.
3. Morality
Nietzsche saw morality as a construct that is shaped by cultural beliefs and values. This notion challenges the idea of objective morality and individual ethical codes. This idea has influenced debates over ethics, multiculturalism and the role of religion in shaping moral beliefs.
4. Self-Overcoming
One of Nietzsche's key ideas is that individuals must overcome their limitations and conformity to society's norms in order to be truly human. This idea has influenced modern-day culture as individuals seek individual autonomy and self-actualization.
5. The Will to Power
Nietzsche's view of the will to power is the concept that individuals strive to expand and dominate others to feel a sense of power. This idea has been utilized by politicians and business leaders to motivate people to work towards achievements and to drive their employees to excel.
Overall, Nietzsche's ideas have been influential in modern-day culture in many ways.
What was Friedrich Nietzsche's most important contribution to philosophy?
Nietzsche was a German philosopher who lived in the late 1800s. Although he did not start his career as a philosopher, he is widely regarded as one of the key figures of the late 19th century German Idealism movement in philosophy.
Nietzsche's most significant contribution to philosophy was his critique of traditional Western values and of the prevailing culture during his time. He questioned the existence of objective truth, the existence of free will and individual morality, and the value of individual achievement. He also challenged the idea of religious truth and rejected the notion of an afterlife.
Nietzsche sought to replace these outdated values with a new "will to power," which he saw as the primary drive of all organisms in nature, including human beings. He argued that this motivation was more important than any other, including self-preservation or social cooperation. Nietzsche also developed the concept of the "superman," which represented the highest level of personal fulfillment attainable by individuals. Nietzsche's philosophy was heavily influenced by the writings of Aristotle and his rejection of the traditional teachings of Christianity.
Overall, Nietzsche's contributions to philosophy centered on his critique of traditional notions of morality and of the pursuit of individual happiness. He challenged the idea of objective truth and of the need to adhere to traditional values. These challenges continue to be relevant in contemporary philosophy, and Nietzsche remains an influential figure in the world of philosophy.

The AI Ethics Board and its importance
The AI Ethics Board is an organization that works to ensure the development of ethical AI standards that help us navigate the challenges of technology. One of the key challenges is to strike the balance between human values and technological considerations. An AI Ethics Board is vital in such efforts.
The AI Ethics Board will collaborate with different industries and organizations to address challenges such as the impact of AI on human lives. A more inclusive and open-minded approach to shaping AI policies is an essential element of any ethical AI standard.
The AIEB, for example, looks to build bridges between industry leaders, researchers, government agencies and the broader public to create standards that promote and protect the ethical development and usage of AI systems.
The future of AI in moral and ethical values
AI systems are already changing the world, and in the near future, we will continue to witness more changes in the field. However, the values we embrace will have a great influence on how we shape such AI systems.
If we can adopt an open-minded and diverse perspective by considering the "best of" values from various cultures, we'll be in a better position to create ethical AI standards that ensure a promising future.

instruction: Hi, can you tell me a story in a novel format including dialogs between the characters, a story based on the Justice League comics, including the characters, Green Arrow, Red Arrow and Cheshire.
output:
Hi, can you tell me a story in a novel format including dialogs between the characters, a story based on the Justice League comics, including the characters, Green Arrow, Red Arrow and Cheshire.
Hi, so here is my attempt to craft a story based on some of the elements that you mentioned. Hope you find it interesting! Please let me know if there are any other characters I can add for a completely satisfying solution.
A Man In Search of Peace (Green Arrow)
A few years back, Oliver Queen became one of the Justice League's foremost members. However, before that transition, he worked with them as a freelance member, fighting the good fight with others like Batman, Superman, Aquaman, and the Flash.
While he has grown a reputation for hunting down various superpowered criminals or helping other heroes with their missions, he's also gained a reputation as being more of a loner. It's not out of any sense of arrogance, but, on the contrary, because he needs to sort through his own inner problems as he goes on missions, without any distractions.
One such mission, he gets stranded on the other side of America, when he decides to go back to his hometown, Starling City. It is a city that has grown used to the kind of high-stakes, superhero actions that Oliver Queen is famous for executing, but he feels the need to go away from the chaos for a while.
He arrives, only to see a new development in town-the creation of a giant prison, an immense skyscraper-shaped structure. While he wasn't aware of this in real time, he finds out, that the facility is the first of a new kind-one designed specifically for superpowered criminals. But, what is more significant is that the facility is run almost exclusively by superpowered folks-there are no supervillains, there are no ordinary people-it's a place where only criminals with special abilities get incarcerated.
Upon discovering this, Green Arrow instantly becomes interested, because he was always against using high-tech prisons to keep people locked up.
He begins to question the new facility as his vigilante routine continues, he sees how there are people who have been captured, those he would've helped in the past, like some of his superhero allies, who are now locked up inside.
This makes him understand that the new prison is actually a great way to separate innocent people from villains, and that it is a way to keep them from ever seeing the light of day, as opposed to what he always thought about superheroes, but it's an issue that he couldn't solve on his own.
His search for a solution brings him to an old friend named Quentin Lance, who had played an important role in his life before his exile. He starts to ask Quentin about the prison, and together they discover that the facility was meant to be a place where people who have unique abilities-or at least special powers-get help.
He was part of the team that built it as one of the prison guards under the guise of a warden. As they talk, he begins to realize that the prison's purpose is not to punish people, but to rehabilitate them-to create a place for supervillains, to understand their abilities, to find cures for them, and to learn ways to control or enhance those same abilities.
At first, Oliver is happy to hear that the prison has a purpose, that it is not just a high-tech, high-security jail facility, but it does not come to an end with one sentence. The story's end is the most significant-Green Arrow finds salvation in this idea, one that has been waiting for him over the years. As he learns more and more about the mission, he eventually understands that the facility isn't just a place where people with special abilities can get help with their skills, but also a place where they can give back to society.
It is a place where people work together in a team-based environment, where supervillains can be part of a team, learn their abilities, and understand how to get back to people.
Green Arrow decides to join the prison as it begins its first mission, helping supervillains learn to manage, control and enhance their abilities.
Red Arrow and Cheshire
Meanwhile, back in Los Angeles, a new duo is gaining notoriety in the world of superheroes, known as Red Arrow and Cheshire.
Red Arrow is a young man, with the powers of a speedster (he's able to run at superhuman speeds, and is able to move objects using momentum). He's also incredibly handsome, and has grown up with a passion for protecting the innocent.
Cheshire, a former actress (she's able to blend into whatever background makes for a perfect cover), is a master tactician and a specialist in the use of gadgets and traps. Her looks are just as important, although

instruction: Can I compile python code to make it faster?
output:
Can I compile python code to make it faster?

Generally speaking, python coding style is optimized for readability, which means python codes are generally not optimized to make them faster. However, there is still some ways to make python code faster, even though python typically tends to be a slower language compared to some other languages like c.
For your python codes, you can optimize them by:

* Avoiding loops if possible by using list comprehensions, tuples, and dict comprehensions.
* Using proper data structures, such as array or collections to store similar data for efficient access
* Using optimizations specifically available for python such as Python 3.x vectorized operations (in general more likely to be faster in 3.x vs 2.7) and ctypes (more for dealing with c language libraries, but generally the approach can be useful in python/ctypes code)
* Compile your python codes using python compiled as C/C++. There are cpython's ccompiler and pypy, but the process is relatively complex
* Try to use specific libraries or modules that were specifically designed to work with very precise optimizations. However, keep in mind that such libraries or modules may have a cost in terms of complexity, or more maintainability.
More details in the following articles :

* http://www.geek.net/wiki/Python:_Compiling_Py2Python_with_the_new_CPython_compiler
* https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2044186/optimize-python-code-for-speed

So, to answer your question, it still depends on the use case, and you must choose the approach that makes most sense for your program requirements / use case.

instruction: Given two matrices A and B which you can multiply together, does (A B)^T = A^T B^T or B^T A^T?
output:
Given two matrices A and B which you can multiply together, does (A B)^T = A^T B^T or B^T A^T?
Here is how I understand it: 
If B is the identity (I), then (A B)^T = A^T B^T or B^T A^T.
A has to be in the right form for (A B)^T = B^T A^T only, since (A B)^T = (AB)^T A^T.
The question is, how to determine the right form of A?
Is it an upper triangular matrix? A diag-positive matrix or only diag-negative matrix? something else?
I would love if someone can clarify this. Thanks. 

A: If $A$ and $B$ are square matrices, then their product $A B$ is also square, and both formulas hold, with equality if and only if $A$ and $B$ have the same number of columns as they have rows.
Now come at that if $B$ is the identity matrix $I$. Then if $A$ has the same number of columns and rows, we get $A B = A$ (as $AB \mathrm{rows} = A\mathrm{rows}$, by the definition of multiplication of matrices), and so $A^T I$ and $A^T A$ have the same number of columns and rows, so by the commutative property of transposes, we get $I^T A^T = A^T$.
So if $B$ is $I$ we have to check if $A$ has the right form. As it has the same number of rows and columns, it must be upper triangular, and in the upper triangular form we write it as the product of its main diagonal and other matrices only diagonal.
Now to the question: $M = AB$ so $\text{rank}\left(M\right) = \text{rank}(A) = \text{rank}(B)$.
To apply this to the question, let's say $A$ is a diag-negative matrix and $B$ is diag-positive. You may check that $AB=A$. So $\text{rank} \left( AB \right) = \text{rank} \left( A \right) = 1>0$ so $M$ is invertible. So $AB^T = A^T B$. Then $AB^T B = A^T B^T B$. And $A^T B^T$ would work too.
As to whether $B^T A^T$ or $A^T B^T$ works depends on what you're asked to prove. If it's the form of the product, then you know that it's $AB^T$ or $A^T B^T$, depending on the form of $A$.
As to whether they work, here it depends. Let's consider the cases separately:


*

*If $A$ is non-diag-positive and $B$ is non-diag-negative, then neither $A^T B^T$ or $B^T A^T$ works, since their trace is not zero.

*If $A$ and $B$ both have diag-negative or diag-positive entries, then it's enough if $A$ is in the right form (just like in the previous case) that they become equal (e.g. $A^T$ is not used in the argument)
We see that this kind of analysis is not as trivial as it looks.

instruction: What is the meaning of life?
output:
What is the meaning of life?” asks the old man.
What is the sound of one hand clapping?, laughs the old one.
It’s a silly question, really, isn’t it? In some contexts, the answer seems to be quite obvious. When I was a child, my grandfather would ask me “What is the sound of one hand clapping?” and I would respond “clack clack” or something like that. At that stage in my development, I couldn’t even say the word “cymbals”, let alone imagine myself clapping with one hand. I still don’t know really, but I suppose that the joke is more on the old man who asks the question than anything else.
For someone who claims to have a grasp (or a taste at least) on death (see the previous post), a conversation about the meaning of life seems like it ought to be something that this “old man” shouldn’t find surprising. Indeed. The meaning of life is a very serious and complicated matter for many human beings, and one that we spend a lot of time and effort trying to find the answer to.
The question, as it happens, is not just, “What is the sound of one hand clapping?”
It is, “What is the meaning of life?”
“So, to get to the bottom of this question, one must have found out what life is to begin with.” says the old man. “What is life?” asks the young girl. The old one laughs again.
The question itself has its roots in ancient philosophy, most notably in the writings of Aristotle. After all, Plato, who also dealt extensively with the questions of existence and how to live a good life (Socrates was his student and was ultimately condemned to death by Athenian authorities for impugning the state) , wasn’t just focused on his ideas about epistemology, that is, how we know things. He was deeply interested in a series of interconnected topics, and one of these was the question of what is life.
Aristotle, for his part, took quite a different approach from Plato, and one of the ways to see the difference is by focussing, as Aristotle does, on the question what is substance? Plato’s approach is, in some respects, to treat the question as a pre-existing, ready-made question: What is substance? Here is my answer. Aristotle, however, thinks that the best approach to answering the question — and everything else, too — is by starting from the questions and by asking them of some sort of common experience. “The common experience is what we call to be alive,” he told his students. The whole of reality is built from living beings and things that sustain life.
For Aristotle, life itself had a very specific meaning: It was a matter of order, purpose, and development. There was a place for everything, a purpose for everything. The sun was there to provide light, the moon to regulate the cycles of life, the earth to give birth to new being, and so forth. Everything, in Aristotle’s worldview, had a purpose.
This idea that life has a purpose plays a big role in Western thought. We can think of how the questions of what is life and what is the purpose of life come into play in various ways, and I’ll try to show some of these now.
Here’s a funny story: my cousin came into my house the other night, and we were chatting just casually — like we sometimes do — when she suddenly said “I want to live a purposeful life.” I laughed at her, because it was silly, and also because no one can expect to always live a purposeful life. And my cousin responded, “Yeah, I get that, but it’s still a good thing, right? It’s good to live life in a purposeful way, I guess.”
Now, I admit something here. I might just have been too busy rolling my eyes when she said that. And, certainly, her intention with the words was entirely positive, but the very idea of living with purpose or a clear goal has its roots in what may be, with Aristotle, a deeply problematic idea. Many of the big problems we face today, the issues, the suffering, the struggles, the wars, the destruction of our planet and the loss of species, are the result of us pushing human-centric ideas about life. Here’s one example: We live today in a world that is characterized by environmental degradation, overpopulation, and waste. So, to fix these problems, we may need to see the world as something other than a living thing. But if the notion of life has a purpose, of living with a sense of meaning and direction, then this view of life itself becomes something that we need to defend.

write me script that shows the saves a dictionnary in json format in a file in python
output:
write me script that shows the saves a dictionnary in json format in a file in python3 / python2 I try a dictionnary
a = {'a': 1, 'b': 2, 'c': 3}

and i want to save them in a json in a text file
import json
with open('file.json', 'w') as write_file:
    json.dump(a, write_file)

when i do that
with open('file.json', 'r') as read_file:
    b = json.load(read_file)

but b is empty
I try to
a = json.dumps(dict_a, indent=4)

but he throws an exception 
    Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "file.py", line 6, in <module>
    a = json.dumps(dict_a, indent=4)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.3/json/__init__.py", line 258, in dumps
    return _default_encoder.encode(obj)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.3/json/encoder.py", line 207, in encode
    chunks = self.iterencode(o, _one_shot=True)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.3/json/encoder.py", line 270, in iterencode
    return _iterencode(o, 0)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.3/json/encoder.py", line 179, in default
    raise TypeError(f'Object of type {o.__class__.__name__} '
TypeError: Object of type dict_a is not JSON serializable

I try
a = json.dumps(dict_a.items())

but the result is
[('a', 1), ('b', 2), ('c', 3)]

Does somebody know why? 

A: If you are interested to read the dictionary values from a file without losing any information, you might be better off using pickle.  Here's an example:
import pickle

with open(filename, "rb") as fp:
  a = pickle.load(fp)

If you want to directly work with JSON, then the proper format to use for a dictionary is: {"a": 1, "b": 2, "c": 3}.  When you try to dump the dictionary, using dict_a as the name for the key, Python's JSON parser tries to encode a dict_a object instead of a name.  Change your call to:
with open(filename, 'w+') as write_file:
    json.dump({'dict_a': a}, write_file)

instruction: What is the james webb telescope
output:
What is the james webb telescope for?
The James Webb Space Telescope will study both the beginning and end of the universe. It is designed to observe the universe and its objects on a scale never before seen, looking back to the time 13.5 billion years ago, right after the Big Bang. Its goal is to examine the first light in the Universe, the birth of stars and proto-planets.
JWST’s technology is much more advanced than that of the Hubble Telescope. Because of this, JWST has the ability to see deeper into space and gather more than 100 times more light than Hubble.
Who is involved in the James Webb space telescope?
The James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) is an international collaboration between the space agencies participating in the mission, which are the United States, European Space Agency (ESA), Canadian Space Agency (CSA), and the Space Telescope Science Institute (STScI).
The project is also a product of the international agreement between the US and ESA. In August 1994 an international agreement was signed in France, with the intention of launching a successor to the Hubble. This new telescope, eventually named the James Webb Space Telescope, would serve as a successor both to the Hubble Space Telescope and the much older Palomar 200-inch telescope.
The JWST is a huge telescope project with its development having cost billions of US dollars, and as such, there is a significant amount of work involved in its construction. However, it is the end product of an international alliance of space agencies that aim to further scientific knowledge with this magnificent piece of technology.
Does the james webb telescope work as planned or what happened to the second?
The JWST was expected to go into space in 2007, but delays and technical problems have caused further challenges. Unfortunately, the JWST’s launch in 2010 was cancelled, and it was not until 2019 that SpaceX finally launched the JWST spacecraft and then its sunshield, where it has since been deployed.
Why was there a delay to launching JWST?
The James Webb Telescope was intended to launch in 2007, but it endured a series of delays. One of the main issues was the development and integration of the mirror, which were not complete until five years after it was to be launched.
The mirror alone would weigh more than the space shuttle itself, so it had to be carefully designed, produced, and integrated onto the telescope. This process took over ten years to complete, along with all the other aspects of the telescope’s construction, which had originally been scheduled for 2005.
Many other challenges were involved in the development and deployment of the telescope, such as the integration of a 280-meter diameter sunshield. The project eventually had to be restarted, and it wasn’t until 2011 that the mission got funded for construction to continue.
Why is the james webb telescope called james webb telescope?
The telescope, called the James Webb Space Telescope initially after the space administrator who championed funding for it in the 1980s, was originally named the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) but became the James Webb Telescope or simply the James Webb.
It refers to the former Director of the NASA Space Science and Exploration Division, which is now the director of the space science directorate and is known as James Webb. He is responsible for the James Webb Space Telescope’s development and research and its scientific data will be used by astronomers worldwide.
The James Webb telescope is the most expensive and complex space telescope ever, and its scientific achievements will revolutionize our understanding of the universe. The telescope’s technology is capable of discovering new ways to understand space, and there is an abundance of scientific research still to be conducted on the telescope.
Will the james webb telescope have a life of its own?
The James Webb Space Telescope has been launched several times over in its lifetime, including being decommissioned several times before its current launch. It has spent time in a storage facility after being used for data collection. However, it was due to undergo some maintenance work in 2020 that the decision was made to send it into space again to complete some research before decommissioning.
James Webb Space Telescope has an expected life of six years, and after this time, it will be placed in a helio-orbital path beyond the Sun’s habitable zone, making it difficult for solar flare activity and to damage the telescope’s infrared sensitive instruments, thus keeping the telescope active for as long as possible.
Is the james webb telescope a success?
The JWST was still launched in 2021 and is a massive success since it opened in July 2022

output:
Hi, my cat just chewed on a small weed outside that looked like hairy bittercress.
Could you check if this is toxic for cats?
Please also look for plants from the same family, as I'm not 100% sure I identified it correctly.
A member of the cress family, hairy bittercress is poisonous to dogs and cats, but that isnt to say it shouldnt be eaten by your cat. Your kitten will be perfectly fine and will not suffer any long term effects from ingesting a small amount of hairy bittercress.
Your cat will also not suffer any short term effects when ingesting it, so there is simply no need to worry about the risk. Hairly bittercress simply should not be given to your cat as it could cause some adverse symptoms.
However, should your cat suddenly fall into a deep sleep it should alert you to seek medical attention right away, as it could be a sign of poison intake.
Hairy bittercress contains the toxin phenol, which makes it extremely toxic to both canines and felines. Although your cat cannot eat this plant too often, it is toxic to animals. Your cat can still eat it, but only for a very short period.
Hairy bittercress is a biennial plant that grows in moist, shady areas including woodland and meadows. It grows in tall, cylindrical clumps that can reach up to fifty centimeters high.
It has round, shiny leaves that are soft to the touch and have fine hairs on them. The flower stems of the plant are also covered in soft hairs. The small, white or purplish flowers are arranged in clusters along the central stalk.
As I mentioned earlier, ingesting hairy bittercress is unsafe for your cat. If you notice that your cat started having respiratory troubles like coughing while breathing, dizziness, vomiting or any other similar symptoms, it is important to seek for professional help without any delay.
So, hairy bittercress is generally known as poisonous to both dogs and cats, but you need not give it to your pet if your cat chewed it off the plant. If your cat ingests hairy bittercress, take it to your veterinarian right away to rule out any possible signs of toxicity.
However, as mentioned earlier, the ingestion of hairy bittercress by your cat is not expected to pose a serious threat to its health. It may cause mild digestive issues in your cat, but with the help of your vets, these digestive issues will go away in no time.
There you have it, hairy bittercress is a toxic plant, but your cat wont enjoy eating it. So, if your cat ate a small amount of hairy bittercress, you can rest peaceful knowing that it will not cause any harm to your pet.

instruction: In minecraft, what are the best ways to farm experience quickly? Name pros and cons
output:
In minecraft, what are the best ways to farm experience quickly? Name pros and cons.
In my experience, a great way to farm experience in minecraft is to keep your players in a safe environment, near a village (preferably with a high-level player there). Have a group of survivors build a fort in a large and plentiful farmland, or a well-lit and accessible town. That way, the villagers will keep a constant stream of items coming your way, which you can use to sell (and make money), and get resources like experience point. This way, you will be near other players, and they won’t mind you playing on their server.
The idea with this strategy is to get players close together, and have them trade and share items—which means you’ll be able to get your hands on a variety of different items more quickly, like the experience points they can offer. This creates a good dynamic that gets everyone helping each other out, and it makes the game much more fun (and less solo-focused). Because people are grouped up in this way, this also helps your villagers stay alive, which is extremely valuable as you’ll want to maximize their usefulness over time.
That all being said, remember, farming experience isn’t the only way to gain experience. The key is to keep players in a dynamic, group-oriented environment, allowing them to interact with others and get things that they couldn’t get otherwise. With that in mind, there are other ways to go about getting experience, including through combat, the trading system, and even through creative mode.
To help you understand how those elements work, here are some key pros and cons of farming experience in minecraft.
Fast and Efficient
If you have the fort or community surrounding you, your players can quickly gain experience points thanks to high levels of interaction. This way can be a great way to get people moving and get things happening in your community.
Pro: Convenient, Effective, and Efficient.
Con: Low Challenge and Repetition. Farming experience is inherently low-risk thanks to the low level players involved, so it lacks the same level of excitement and challenge as other ways to gain EXP.
PvP Encounters
Going head-to-head with other players can be a great way to build experience—especially if you’re playing in a competitive environment. This way has been the standard since early days for gaining EXP, and it’s still a popular way in PVP servers and gamemodes.
Pro: Challenging, Exciting, and Fun. It’s what most people think of when they picture getting EXP in Minecraft, and for good reason. These types of encounters can be exciting and exciting, and they usually involve multiple players competing against one another. It can be a rewarding and thrilling experience, especially in a more aggressive, competitive environment.
Con: Can Be Risky with Low Skill. Going up against higher-level players in PVP can be risky, and the odds aren’t usually in your favor, especially with lower skill players. This means getting into fights can take a while, and it may take a lot of time and effort to really make a difference.
Creative Mode
Farming EXP in Creative Mode is extremely fast and efficient. Simply start a Minecraft world, build a city inside of it, and watch as the EXP steadily accumulates from the various activities and interactions you have with other players.
Pro: Efficient, Fast, and Simple. In creative mode, farming EXP is a breeze, especially when going it alone and going for sheer numbers—with a few simple buildings, people can rapidly accrue much more EXP.
Con: Lack of Skills. Creative mode is a place for making things and learning about how Minecraft works. It’s not the place for building a solid base of practical skills that you can take with you to other modes.
Trade and Tradeskills
The trading system is another way to gain EXP in Minecraft. Simply make items, sell them, trade with other players, and use your money to buy items that are related to your EXP.
Pro: In-Game Currency, Skill-Based. Like the PVP mode, this is a skill-based way to gain EXP that requires you to actually do things in-game.
Con: Time-consuming and Requires Skilled Play. It’s time-consuming and requires that players be skilled in many areas of the game, requiring plenty of experience on their part. It’s also much more difficult than other methods of farming EXP.
In general, Minecraft is an extremely challenging and rewarding game experience, giving players a wide range of modes to choose from. The above ways to gain experience in Minecraft can help provide you with a solid base from which to start out with and to build further over time. But don’t forget about the importance of
